name: Muckraker Boots
description: Just the thing for the adventurer who's going to be trudging through all manner of poisonous swamps and dangerous terrain.

name: Conducting Solution
description: Water saturated with salt to a degree that it will conduct electricity.

name: Ebony Plate (U)
description: The upper portion of a suit of ornate ebony plate armour, magically hardened.

name: Propero's Cloak
description:
Now my charms are all o'erthrown,
And what strength I have's mine own...
 ~ Prospero

name: Hand Axe
description: A light single bladed axe that could easily double as a wood chopping tool.

name: Freedom
description: A masterwork claymore, perfectly balanced and clearly well used in battle.

name: Poet's Lute
description: A slender necked tenor lute. You have tuned it in G. An unassuming instrument, but in the hands of a skilled user and in the presence of gold magic it can be used to passify or confuse your foes.

name: Necklace Of Endurance
description: A magic necklace of energy to keep you going.

name: Viper Arrow
description: Arrows tipped with deadly poison.

name: Grimoire Of Sane Mind
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Oliveskin Doublet
description: A swarthy stained jerkin.

name: Skull Dagger
description: Deadly throwing knives, drenched in horrifying poison.

name: Amulet Of Ares
description: An small golden amulet, dedicated to your fierce god of war.

name: Sarissa
description: An extremely long spear, over four meters long, sporting a leaf shaped iron head.

name: Amulet Of Airs
description: An amulet to protect you from deadly fumes.

name: Ring Of Jade
description: This finely carved jade ring feels strangely greasy to the touch.

name: Sapphire Ring
description: A classy ring with an inlaid sapphire.

name: Powered Exoskeleton (U)
description: Integrated with a steam powered hydraulic system, this hard steel exoskeleton augments the wearer in a number of different ways.

name: Doublestrike
description: This dagger yearns to be buried in your foes.

name: Lightning Targe
description: This blue painted targe crackles with arcs of electricity.

name: X-bow Mk5
description: A clever set of gears integrated with the reloading mechanism has enabled you to increase the firing rate of your weapon yet again. You have modified the hopper to allow you to load arrows as well as bolts.

name: Grimoire Of Recharge
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: X-bow Mk6
description: Incredibly, you have managed to integrate a third crossbow prod into this device. The firing rate of the weapon is now virtually unmatched; you are able to fill the air with a deadly hail of projectiles. You have tuned the pulley system to increase individual projectile velocity, and added a recoil-compensation system to increase accuracy.

name: Striders
description: Nothing burns up the lonely forest trail like a tough pair of Striders.

name: X-bow Mk1
description: You have upgraded this light crossbow with a second firing prod so that it shoots two bolts at one time. You've also tweaked the springs to add to the power and cut down reload times. You have great ideas for other enhancements that might be feasible, but you need more time to play with the designs. It amuses you to refer to your new toy as an 'X-bow'.

name: X-bow Mk2
description: Your first attempt at an automated reloading system involves a simple manual reset lever. It has speeded up operation somewhat, but you think that you can do better. Tweaking the wire strings has caused them to impart an alarming buzz on outgoing bolts, inspiring fear in your foes.

name: X-bow Mk3
description: The integration of a brass ammo hopper into the reloading system has been a breakthrough, allowing you to significantly increase the throughput of the device. You have also integrated a pulley system into both crossbow prods, increasing the projectile exit velocity.

name: Leather Greaves
description: Hardened leather greaves to protect the shins.

name: Crux Ansata
description: The handled cross, enhancing your magical power.

name: X-bow Mk4
description: You've added a hair trigger mechanism to your X-bow, significantly increasing your chances of firing first in an engagement. Tweaking the balance has increased the weapon accuracy. You have also modified the ammo supply system to coat outgoing bolts with a debilitating poison.

name: Shino Suneate
description: Splint mail and leather greaves.

name: Blade Cuisinart
description: Perfect for slicing and dicing your foes.

name: Pipes Of The Sea
description: These simple looking pipes appear to be made from some strange sort of sea shells, azure tubes bound with coarse fiber cloth. Holding them your ear, you can faintly hear a roar like the distant sea.

name: Fey Needle
description: A thin bone dagger, all that remains of an unlucky traveller deceived on a dark night.

name: Ambassador's Amulet
description: A magic amulet that makes things happen for you.

name: Brilliant Helm
description: A polished steel burgonet, enchanted with spells of logic and genius.

name: Reaper
description: An intricately worked and finely balanced steel battleaxe that feels as warm as freshly spilled blood in your hands. Hefting it, you are filled with lust for battle and mayhem.

name: Mantis Gloves
description: Curious green scaled gloves, these look like they may have been fashioned from the carapace of a giant mantis.

name: War Scepter
description: A finely crafted steel mace.

name: Codex Of Fervour
description: A rare codex bearing the inscrutable mysteries of an epic feat of magic. The scuffed and faded leaves are filled with dire warnings and cautions.

name: Javelin
description: A light spear designed for casting as a ranged weapon.

name: Smallsword
description: A light one-handed sword designed for thrusting, the smallsword is a descendent of the longer and heavier rapier. Some may call it more of a fashion accessory or status symbol, but it can be a very effective duelling weapon.

name: Grimoire Of Purify Air
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Sword Of Goujian
description: A finely crafted bronze jian, with a black lacquer scabbard. Worm-like runes on the blade read "Belonging to King Goujian of Yue, made for his personal use".

name: Script Of Charm
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Scimitar
description: A curved scimitar with an S-shaped guard, light and wickedly sharp.

name: Sabre
description: A single edged cavalry sabre, weighted for slashing.

name: Amulet Of Spiders
description: An ornate spider amulet.

name: Medusa Stone
description: Deadly, enchanted sling stones.

name: Flak Jacket
description: A heavy leather hauberk, designed to withstand small arms fire.

name: Potion Of Renewal
description: A potion with great healing and curative powers.

name: Piety
description: The footwear of choice for saints, pilgrims and martyrs.

name: Dispersive Prism
description: A geometrical triangular prism that can be used to break light into its spectral components.

name: Ankh Of Dexterity
description: A cunning ankh of skill.

name: Tongji
description: This light wooden cudgel is covered with odd angular runes. The fine finish and maintenance can't hide the scars that tell a tale of heavy and violent use.

name: Script Of Frostbite
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Heavy Crossbow
description: A heavy windlass operated crossbow.

name: Moss Staff
description: A gnarled wooden staff, bursting with green magic.

name: Air Filter
description: A compact particulate air filter, useful for scrubbing air passed through it of most harmful particles.

name: Cold Iron Spike
description: A jagged, meter long iron spike.

name: Bullet Stone
description: Smooth rounded stones for use in a sling.

name: Iron Ration
description: Not very tasty, but will keep you going.

name: Urn Of Ashes
description: A small terracotta urn, holding a pinch of mysterious ashes. A brass plate on it bears a runic inscription that you cannot decipher.

name: Codex Of Renewal
description: A rare codex bearing the inscrutable mysteries of an epic feat of magic. The scuffed and faded leaves are filled with dire warnings and cautions.

name: Amulet Of Rainbows
description: A ruby amulet, shimmering with many different colours.

name: Book Of Mage Blades
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Script Of Cure Lesser Condition
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Plate Mail (L)
description: The lower portion of a fine suit of steel plate armour.

name: Lightning Gun
description: Upgrading the Telsa Coil with a high voltage transformer turns it into a wicked weapon capable of discharging a powerful bolt of lightning.

name: Vulcan Hammer
description: A heavy iron hammer, forged by some long forgotten dwarven smith in the heart of a volcano and consecrated by the barbaric godling that lived there.

name: Winterwand
description: An ice cold sapphire wand. Frost forms on any surface it touches.

name: Book Of Crush
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Fire Bomb
description: A high explosive incendiary bomb.

name: Locket Of Reflection
description: A precious locket that reflects damage back on your attacker.

name: Spear Of Ineoth
description: You took this short spear from the cold dead hand of Ineoth-Em-Risiss-Mar, after you slew him in a dark glade in Stygios Forest. It is made entirely of bone, and the tip is wickedly barbed. It is painfully cold to the touch, and your skin crawls when handling the weapon.

name: Soulful Sax
description: A large, impressive saxophone - polished chrome finished with white gold and inlaid with mother-of-pearl. The instrument gleams in the light, glowing with pure radiance. You can't resist busting out a quick number and the song played solo on this sax  is a crazy sound, a lonely sound, a cry that tells you that love goes on and on, tells you to hold someone tight and dance like it's the last night of the world....

name: Fowling Piece
description: Fowling Piece, a portable Fire Arm for the shooting of Birds. See Fire Arm. Of Fowling Pieces, those are reputed the best, which have the longest Barrel, vis. from 5 1/2 foot to 6; with an indifferent Bore, under Harquebus: Tho' for different Occasions they shou'd be of different Sorts, and Sizes. But in all, 'tis essential the Barrel be well polish'd and smooth within; and the Bore all of a Bigness, from one End to another.

name: Smudge Powder
description: A pinch of this and you'll be blending into the background.

name: Ring Of Ambition
description: A fiery golden ring, burning with unquenched ambition.

name: Corrosion Bomb
description: This bomb splatters your foes with corrosive acid.

name: Grimoire Of Resurrection
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Gorgon
description: A fearsome ensorcelled flail, lengths of black iron chain join an adamantine haft and a dozen jagged adamantine heads carved in the likeness of snarling serpent heads.

name: Carnelian Necklace
description: A talisman enchanted with spells of alertness and observance.

name: Toadstone Ring
description: A ring bearing a large toadstone.

name: Empty Bottle
description: This bottle is neither half full nor half empty.

name: The Voyages Of Maranera
description: This book contains an extremely long narrative poem about someone called Maranera voyaging between various parts of a continent or nation called Tarsis. He (or she, you're not sure) faces a variety of dangers and adventurers along the way, but always survives and makes a profit. The language is very dated, and you're going to have to sit down and concentrate to read it properly.

name: Steam Powered Gatling
description: You somewhat abandoned subtlety here, and just focussed on building a whacking huge machine for propelling the maximum volume of material at the maximum velocity in the minimum possible time. Accuracy doesn't matter much given sufficient spread.

name: Stinger
description: A cunningly crafted tachi blade, sharp and deadly. The leather grip feels oddly icky to you.

name: Script Of Slow
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Tripleshot
description: You would have sworn it was impossible, but someone has modded this light crossbow to shoot three bolts at once. Be careful when you reload it.

name: Faraday Helm
description: A helm specifically designed to protect your brain from external electromagnetic radiation.

name: Monstrance
description: An large, heavy, ornate staff bearing a holy relic. Also good for smiting your foes.

name: Musket
description: A smoothbore muzzle-loaded flintlock musket - brass, iron and darkly polished wood. It looks to you to be a somewhat limited weapon, but as you heft it and sight down it's length, drawing a bead on a distant object, something in your mind comes alive in a way that you don't quite understand. Turning from the weapon, you look around and suddenly the dark corners of your surroundings and the great unknowns before and behind you seem less threatening before, as if some part of the mystery of the world has faded away.

name: Ring Of Invisibility
description: A glittering ruby ring, beautifully ornate. You feel a gripping compulsion to put this on your finger.

name: Vorpal Blade
description:
One, two! One, two! And through and through
The vorpal blade went snicker-snack!
He left it dead, and with its head
He went galumphing back.

name: Scroll Of Melt Armour
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Melt Armour.

name: Was Staff
description: A plain gnarled wooden staff, with a curiosly forked top and tripod base. Grasping it halfway up, you gasp at the magical energy that pulses unchecked around it.

name: Pan Pipes
description: A simple set of bamboo pan pipes, bound with green cloth.

name: Caliban's Cuirass
description:
Be not afeard; the isle is full of noises,
Sounds, and sweet airs, that give delight and hurt not.
 ~ Caliban

name: White Sword
description: A huge silver sword, shining bright white.

name: Grimoire Of Boiling Blood
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Eagle Feather
description: A large wing feather from a tawny eagle.

name: DU Slug
description: These smooth lead musket balls are remarkably heavy for their size. Each ball bears the letters DU. You wonder if it is meant to be somebody's name?

name: Sandals
description: Cheap sandals.  Protects your feet from the road, not the enemy.

name: Ruby Ring
description: A fine, ruby adorned ring.

name: Scroll Of Blades Of Fire
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Blades of Fire.

name: Chikara Sashimono
description: A silk sashimono on a willow frame, mounted on your back. It bears mystic kanji to empower your party.

name: No-dachi
description: A large single bladed sword, finely crafted and very sharp, but difficult to use.

name: Club
description: A blunt instrument.  Nothing special here.

name: Enchanted Bow
description: An enchanted shortbow.

name: Concussion Powder
description: Volatile dust that explodes on impact.

name: Gyroscopic Boots
description: This pair of brass finished leather boots are integrated with a tiny gyroscope, the better to automatically keep you balanced and stepping in the right spots.

name: Clothyard Shaft
description: Long wooden arrows for a long bow.

name: Gold Piece
description: Gold Pieces

name: Reticulated Wolverine
description: This curious item appears to be a scale model of a wolverine. Constructed entirely of brass and cunningly reticulated with numerous joints and wires, you are not sure if this is intended as a toy, a work of art or something else entirely.

name: Flanged Mace
description: A heavy iron mace, with extra flanges. All the better for splattering your enemies.

name: Quarrel
description: A heavy wooden crossbow bolt. Bolts and arrows have different flight characteristics. Bolts fall at the same rate, independent of the speed of flight. Arrows, in contrast, depend on gaining lift in flight, and hence have their centre of balance at a point about 9% of their length forward of their center.

name: Canned Elemental
description: A captive elemental force, desperate to be unleashed.

name: Clockwork Beast
description: A few minutes of winding the key, and you are ready to unleash this deadly device. A whirling brass storm of razor sharp claws, teeth and mindless clockwork fury will fall upon your unfortunate foes.

name: Goggled Helmet
description: A thick steel helm with attached shielded goggles, this devide provides your cranium with excellent protection.

name: Fauchard
description: A pole arm topped with a long, single edged curved blade.

name: Lightning Rod
description: A large iron pole to earth the party.

name: Bloodlust
description: A dented and worn longsword. The hilt fits in your hand like it belongs there, and your heart leaps with hatred for your foes and desire for their destruction. With this weapon by your side, surely you are an unstoppable force.

name: Doom Dart
description: Each dart bears a hideous curse for your foes.

name: Enchanted Robes (L)
description: The lower portion of a set of nifty enchanted robes.

name: Staff Of Shritis
description: This curious staff is made a some light metal alloy and tipped with a luminous yellow crystal. It vibrates faintly in your hands, humming with power, and feels faintly sticky and oily to the touch.

name: Script Of Guardian Angel
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Cape Of Hi-Zen
description: A cloak of peace and meditation.

name: Parabolic Reflector
description: A silver coated plate that has been polished into a reflective sheen and shaped so that it's cross section along both axes is a circular paraboloid.

name: Codex Of Heroism
description: A rare codex bearing the inscrutable mysteries of an epic feat of magic. The scuffed and faded leaves are filled with dire warnings and cautions.

name: Sphyrna
description: A dull and nondescript looking iron hammer, this item is amazingly light. Closer inspection reveals a primitive enchantment of balance and accuracy incribed on the head.

name: Flintlock Pistol
description: A smooth bore flintlock pistol. Guaranteed to make a lot of noise and smoke. You might occasionally punch a hole in the target too.

name: Stone Of New Life
description: A mysterious crystal stone, radiating power.

name: Hail Cider
description: A very old, dusty bottle of hard apple cider. The faded label proclaims "Hail Cider, The Best Of The Best Keeps Getting Better. Brewed On Premise At The Black Dog Inn". A quick whiff suggests to your nose that lying in the bottle hasn't spoiled the brew.

name: Gallicus
description: King Gallicus of Ronjan crafted this fine longsword from blessed steel, forged at noon on the festival of Litha.

name: Ice Bomb
description: Detonates a freezing magical explosion.

name: Sylvan Bow
description: For a thousand years this slim longbow was enchanted by the constant mystic weavings of a hundred Elven enchantresses.

name: Mace
description: An iron headed bludgeoning weapon.

name: Do Maru
description: A wrap-around padded scale armour suit; this piece has no hinges and opens under the right arm. Comes with matching splint sode and kote to protect your arms.

name: Heater Shield
description: A stout heater shield, made from wooden boards and an outer layer of tough leather, painted in heraldic colours.

name: Trollkin Ring
description: A crude emerald ring, the lucky charm of some ancient trollish tribe.

name: Rail Gun
description: An electrically powered artillery gun that accelerates a conductive projectile along homopolar electromagnetic rails. It uses two sliding contacts to permit a large electric current to pass through a metallic  projectile. This current interacts with the strong magnetic fields generated by the rails and accelerates the projectile to higher velocities that contemporary firearm technology allows.

name: Leonal Cuirass
description: An impressive bronze cuirass, cast with a snarling lions head on the front.

name: Hotoke Do
description: A heavy steel clamshell-style cuirass, protecting your torso.

name: PK Crystal
description: A priceless, mind attuned crystal.

name: Spagyric Gem
description: You found this dark, misty gemstone on the altar to Nergal in the Stygios Forest.

name: Potion Of Courage
description: A potion to bolster your spirits.

name: Naginata
description: A well balanced, oval shafted pole arm, topped with an elegant curved blade.

name: Bearskin Cloak
description: A large cloak made from heavy bear skins.

name: Potion Of Blink
description: A potion to make you blink in an out of this plane.

name: Jazeraint Tunic
description: A soft leater tunic, covered with steel plates.

name: Elemental Stone
description: A rock from another plane, humming with blue magic.

name: Boom Bomb
description: This bomb makes a big, scary noise.

name: Field Of Gules
description: A fine heater shield, blazoned in a stiking unadorned red.

name: Electrodes
description: A insulated electrode cable.

name: Feathered Hat
description: A green felt hat adorned with a colourful feather.  Best worn at a jaunty angle.

name: Hachimaki
description: A decorated cloth headband.

name: Holy Cross
description: A blessed cross of silver, radiating white magic.

name: Cloth Pants
description: A nondescript pair of pants, somewhat travel worn and faded.

name: Silver Ring
description: A plain silver ring, non magical.

name: Book Of Melt Armour
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Short Spear
description: A short, one handed thrusting spear.

name: Hunter Quarrel
description: A wooden quarrel with a hunting tip.

name: Awl Pike
description: A long shafted pike, a fair bit taller than you are.

name: Bascinet And Camail
description: A visored steel bascinet with a matching neck protecting camail.

name: Brimstone Nuggets
description: A small pile of sulphurous brimstone chunks.

name: Mystic Robes (L)
description: Nice clean robes. Magic too.

name: Mantis Feathers
description: You've been told that these are the feathers of a giant mantis. Something makes you skeptical.

name: Horn Of Prometheus
description: This burnished bronze horn is warm to the touch. Detailed reliefs on the piece depict the progress of some sort of muscular hero through various adventures which end with him being devoured by a large bird.

name: Sneeze Powder
description: A nasty pepper based irritant.

name: War Hammer
description: A finely wrought steel war hammer.

name: Bag Of Death
description: It feels almost like there's something alive inside here, struggling to get out...

name: Ring Of Breezes
description: A slim silver ring, enchanted with spells of wind and air.

name: Banner Of Roland
description: A red gold banner, fluttering boldly above your party.

name: Fear
description: Lord Kane traded for this bone longbow from the demon Usark with all the gold in the hidden city of Renswald.

name: Scroll Of Mage Missiles
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Mage Missiles.

name: Aqua Ring
description: A plain silver ring, enchanted with spells of ice and water.

name: Smelling Salts
description: Pungent smelling salts for reviving the faint of heart.

name: Potion Of Mirror Image
description: A potion to produce mirror images of you.

name: Twentypints Weiss
description: A green bottle of tasty weiss beer, an easy drinking pint. The label bears a picture of a beaming buxom wench carrying a dozen overflowing beer mugs, below which is the word "TWENTYPINTS" and three small icons, two gold and one silver.

name: Book Of The Dead
description: A dire gimoire, emanating black magic.

name: Feathered Pants
description: These leggings have been made from the hide of some large feathered beast. Despite being looking rather odd, they make for tough and handy protection.

name: Milk Of Magmanasia
description: A milky purple potion, brimming with magical energy.

name: Flash Powder
description: A handful of this volatile stuff produces a bright flash on impact.

name: Baselard
description: A slender double edged bladed weapon, somewhere between a dagger and a short sword. Often used as an off-hand weapon.

name: Robes (L)
description: The lower portion of a set of robes, also shapeless and colourless.

name: Wrist Rocket
description: A finely crafted war sling.

name: Runed Helm
description: Sinister runes cover this rusted steel helmet.

name: Flamestaff
description: An innocuous looking wooden staff, when the wielder utters the correct word it bursts into searing flame.

name: Grimoire Of Call Elemental
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Leather Helm
description: A hardened leather cap.

name: Short Bow
description: A laminated bow just over a meter long.  It's light pull makes it easy to use but not very powerful.

name: TestItem
description: Witty and erudite description.

name: Silk Sleeve
description: A bright silk sleeve, the favour of some noble lady.

name: Odinsword
description: A monstrous two handed sword, the sight of which fills you with terror. Legend has it that drawing the blade will signal the beginning of Ragnarok, and the end of all things.

name: Bat Necklace
description: A small gold locket in the shape of a bat.

name: Grimoire Of Firestorm
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Anointed Flail
description: A number of blunt iron weights attached to chains and thence to a stout wooden handle. This one has been specially consecrated by a High Priest.

name: Book Of Remove Curse
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Stink Bomb
description: This bomb unleashes noxious fumes on one group of enemies.

name: Flynn's Cap
description: The adventurer Flynn wore his lucky cap all his life. It's still got beer stains on.

name: Thunder Stick
description: This iron wand crackles with a static charge just waiting to be unleashed.

name: Chamois Gloves
description: Soft leather gloves.

name: Amulet Of Stillness
description: An quiet, silent amulet.

name: Fear Bolt
description: Crossbow bolts enchanted with dread spells of fear.

name: Lithe Buckler
description: An enchanted bucker shield, perfect for those looking to be light on their feet.

name: Shuriken
description: Razor edged steel throwing stars, blackened to prevent telltale glints.

name: Amulet Of Nebdar
description: The dire amulet of the infamous sorceress Nebdar.

name: Throwing Stiletto
description: Deadly slim throwing knives, just your style.

name: Mingminder's Green Tobacco
description: A hundred grams of dried tobacco leaf, kilned and sold in a brown paper bag. The label proclaims "Mingminder's Finest Dwarrow Tabac."

name: Mystic Dust
description: Mystic dust for summoning a monster from the nightmare planes.

name: Ring Of Beasts
description: An ancient talisman of some non human race.

name: Dana's Halter
description: A rugged yet stylish fur halter top, studded with polished chrome. You feel like a warrior queen in this.

name: Wand Of Winds
description: A bright platinum wand, beloved of the four winds.

name: Red Ear's Taxes
description: This cloth bag jingles with money. It contains the taxes that Red Ear owes the Ichiba Chamber Of Commerce.

name: Blessed Cross
description: A blessed cross to empower your party.

name: Golden Apple
description: A big, juicy golden apple.

name: Powder Of Creation
description: Shimmering elemental powder, for creating beings to fight for you.

name: Snake Dust
description: Nasty poisonous dust, it lingers evilly in the air.

name: Mystery Ray
description: A mysterious ray gun.

name: Yew Bow
description: An enchanted yew bow, especially for magic users.

name: Mercutio's Blade
description:
No, 'tis not so deep as a well, 
nor so wide as a church-door; 
but 'tis enough, 'twill serve: 
ask for me to-morrow, and you shall find me a grave man.
 ~ Mercutio

name: Book Of Cure Poison
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Greatsword
description: An outsized sword with a wide, very long, parallel edged blade ending in a spatulate tip. A straight cross guard tops a extended grip intended for two handed use.

name: Electrum Ring
description: A ring of plain electrum, enchanted for speed.

name: Bone Breaker
description: Large, heavy lead sling bullets. Why muck about with enchanted ammo when kinetic energy can do the job for you?

name: Golden Medallion
description: A fiery golden talisman of protection.

name: Clockwork Orrery
description:
This is an exquisite geared model of the local galaxy. Tiny stars and planets describe graceful newtonian motions in the palm of your hand.

On presentation this irrefutable proof of the superiority of science inevitably destroys the magic using ability of your opponents. Watch as the supernatural wilts and blows away like the wind in the face of physics.

name: Grimoire Of Prismic Missile
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Ariel's Slippers
description:
Before you can say 'come' and 'go,'
And breathe twice and cry 'so, so,'
Each one, tripping on his toe,
Will be here with mop and mow.

name: Ankh Of Phyre
description: A burning ankh of fire and storm.

name: Ivory Blade
description: This keen longsword is made of pure ivory, carved whole from the tusk of a giant hogar by a master smith and meticulously enchanted with spells of strength and courage. Truly a deadly weapon.

name: Dread Spear
description: Your skin crawls as you handle this long, black hafted war spear. Panic stirs ar the back of your mind and your mouth goes dry.

name: Jian
description: A light, flexible straight bladed sword, well balanced and designed for close fighting. This one has has been decorated with some colourful horse hair tassles attached to the pommel.

name: Book Of Superman
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Tesla Coil
description: A bulky device for generating high voltage, low current, high frequency alternating current electricity.

name: Bite Dagger
description: Wicked little weighted blades for hurling at your enemies.

name: Ameratsu's Gown
description: This magnificent splint haramaki-do cuirass is polished and bejewelled.

name: Ring Of Resounding
description: A fine silver ring, at the right command word it unleashes a sonic attack on your foes.

name: Medallion Of Bel
description: You found this tarnished golden medallion in the hut of the mad sorcerer Bel Ies, deep in the Writhing Mire. It bears a wavy-rayed image of a burning sun.

name: Fey Ring
description: The potent heirloom of an ancient fey household.

name: Script Of Invisibility
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Sea Shells
description: A handful of delicate sea shells. One is large enough that you can hear the sea when you hold it to your ear.

name: Null Magic Wand
description: These small wands feel cold and evil to the touch.

name: Roasted Corn
description: Delicious roasted sticks of corn.

name: Book Of Fey Bolt
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Mitre
description: Ecclesiastical headgear.

name: Metronome
description: A mechanical metronome powered by an adjustable weighted pendulum. The pendulum swings back and forth in tempo, while a mechanism inside the metronome produces a clicking sound with each oscillation.

name: Beastslayer
description: This bearded axe has been barbarically decorated with patterns, feathers and bones.

name: Grimoire Of Summon Demon
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Axe Of Many Runes
description: A giant bipennis, covered with sinister runes. You can't read them, but you don't like the look of them.

name: Deadman's Hair
description: A disgusting tangle of hair from a fresh corse.

name: Grimoire Of Astral Gate
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Pneumatic Piston
description: This is a linear steel piston attached to a bulky compressed air cylinder.

name: Sling
description: An inexpensive homemade sling. Easy to learn to use, but it's really only as good as the ammunition that you put in it.

name: Leather Hauberk
description: A hauberk made from hardened leather. Heavy and uncomfortable, but quite good protection.

name: Bardic Harp
description: This small harp is easy to transport and produces sweet and gentle notes. You have tuned it in half tones, ready for use as measured backgrounds and interludes while reciting epic poems. Properly played and in the presence of gold magic, a skilled user can weave protections, enrage foes or even fling dolorous enchantments.

name: Vitriolic Warder
description: A crude likeness of some barbaric squatting godling, all belly and breasts.

name: Book Of Tag
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Elm Arrow
description: Light elm-shafted arrows, straight and true.

name: Enchanted Mail (U)
description: A shimmering magical chainmail hauberk.

name: Morningstar
description: A heavy club with a metal head sporting a number of large intimidating spikes.

name: Angelic Blade
description: A huge silver sword, shining bright white.

name: Demon Quarrel
description: Crossbow bolts enchanted with dread spells of curse and woe.

name: Bone Flute
description: This primitive flute, greenish with age and wear, appears to be made from the femur of some large animal with holes carved in a diatonic scale.

name: Scroll Of Shadow Warriors
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Shadow Warriors.

name: Sacred Slippers
description: Blessed sandals, humble footwear for covering the feet of the faithful.

name: Ballistic Vest
description: A heavy leather and wire mesh ballistic vest, type IIA. Designed to protect the wearer from high velocity projectiles.

name: Modern Astrology
description: This is a detailed astrological treatise, cataloging over forty constellations in the night sky of Hail, none of which you have ever heard of, and their effects on the fates of men.

name: Codex Of Binding
description: A rare codex bearing the inscrutable mysteries of an epic feat of magic. The scuffed and faded leaves are filled with dire warnings and cautions.

name: Wreath Of Ivy
description: An evergreen wreath of wild ivy, alive with the memory of the slumbering oak from which it was unwound.

name: Jesters Slippers
description: Enchanted felt slippers, perfect for the knave who wants to stand out of the crowd.

name: Musket Ball
description: Smooth lead balls for use in unbored gunpowder weapons.

name: Suede Pants
description: Comfortable suede trousers for the discerning outdoorsman.

name: Navajo Bullroarer
description: This primitive instrument is little more than a carved wooden aerofoil attatched to a length of rope. Strange curling runes and pictograms covering the wooden slat catch your eye. Whirling it around your head creates a loud and intimidating roaring sound.

name: Cane Of Corpus
description: A legendary relic of the Wars of Faerie.

name: Camphor Incense
description: This small bag contains several sticks of waxy white incense, sweet smelling and fragrant.

name: Tachi
description: A long single edged sword, an ancestor of the katana.

name: Dreamer Skull
description: A rather sinister looking horned skull. You are not sure what creature this comes from. No matter which way you turn it the eye sockets seem to be focussed on you with creepy mirth.

name: Dagger
description: A knife designed to look like a minature sword.

name: Blackbelt Of Five Flowers
description: A blackbelt from an ancient, famous dojo.

name: Fey Dart
description: Darts of green holly, plucked living from the tree under a bright Samhain moon.

name: Magic Cookie
description: A sugary magic cookie.

name: Tomahawk
description: A light, slim bladed fighting axe with a maple wood haft. This one is decorated with a couple of dashing eagle feathers.

name: Aenen Cavegrown Tobacco
description: This small packet contains pungent kiln-dried tobacco leaves. The label informs you: "Aenen #5, First Grade dried Tobacco leaves. Grown in the Depths of the Earth by the Cunning Gnomes of Aenen. Nourished by the Potent Mineral Cave-Waters of the Below. Nurtured by the Warmth and Light of Mysterious Gnomish Devices. Dried by the Heat of their Industrious Furnaces. Taste the Real Thing, Taste Aenen Cavegrown!"

name: Torbernite Ring
description: A ring made from solid green torbernite.

name: Felt Slippers
description: Brightly coloured, pointy toed felt slippers that speak volumes about your taste in clothing. They do let you move around with rather quietly, but that's not really why you bought them.

name: Mystic Robes (U)
description: Nice clean robes. Magic too.

name: Icicle Stix
description: Discharging one of these unleashes a bolt of ice at your enemies.

name: Rapier
description: A duelling sword with a flexible, slender, often edgeless blade. The weapon of choice for the discerning gentlemen about town.

name: Asa
description: A sturdy stave, shod with steel and embrocated by an saintly abbot on a white stone altar.

name: Saint Bastard
description: A blessed bastard sword, even bigger and heavier than the regular item.

name: Codex Of Curse
description: A rare codex bearing the inscrutable mysteries of an epic feat of magic. The scuffed and faded leaves are filled with dire warnings and cautions.

name: Infinity Helm
description: A gleaming full faced helm, forged from some other planar metal. Energy untapped flows from it, endless reviving your body and mind.

name: Demonsbane
description: A finely crafted ornate-hilted longsword, forged by Ceirdan the smith to protect his monastery from the Demon Queen Al-Sedexus.

name: Wakazashi
description: A short bladed single edged sword, the traditional side arm of the Samurai.

name: Dragon Kite
description: A large heater shield from which a dragon rampant snarls at your foes.

name: Script Of Paralysis
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Scroll Of Whipping Rocks
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Whipping Rocks.

name: Sollerets
description: Steel footware to complete your suit of plate armour.

name: Talismanic Shirt
description: This fine silk shirt has been sewn with a thousand talismans of fortune and protection.

name: Athame
description: A ceremonial dagger with a double-edged steel blade and a dark mahogany handle.

name: Dragon's Teeth
description: A bag full of large dragon fangs.

name: Faerie Cap
description: A magical cap from the land of faerie.

name: Codex Of Prismic Chaos
description: A rare codex bearing the inscrutable mysteries of an epic feat of magic. The scuffed and faded leaves are filled with dire warnings and cautions.

name: Steel Guantlets
description: A pair of hardy steel gauntlets.

name: Bodhisattva
description: This perfectly balanced wooden violin is a curious piece. Tiny, intricate carvings of stylised men and women with beatific expressions cover the body and march up the neck. The strings and the bow shimmer with some strange golden luminescence, shedding enough light to read a score by. Clearly it bears some kind of enchantment.

name: Viola D'Amore
description: You are impressed with the fine workmanship of this classical viola. Larger than a violin but smaller than a cello, this one is crafted from varnished hazelnut and decorated with an intricate pattern of moons and stars.

name: Chamail Pants
description: Padded quilt leggings, decorated with mystic patterns of warding and safety.

name: Ring Of Shielding
description: A tarnished gold ring, this will shield you from harm.

name: Nagamaki
description: This unusual sword has a meter long single edged blade attached to a leather-bound wooden handle that is equally long. Using it two handed gives you an odd looking but effective weapon.

name: Bowel Raker
description: The favoured ammunition of the rattkin razuka, these deadly darts cause horrific wounds.

name: Estoc De Olivia
description: A meter long, double handled estoc, ornately decorated. This item was used by the famous heroin Olivia Espada.

name: Glass Cannon
description: You have managed to harness the refractive properties of glass to build a unique laser powered cannon with interesting potential for destruction.

name: Grimoire Of Wither Plants
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Silken Gloves
description: A rather ratty pair of silk gloves.

name: Shrunken Head Totem
description: Half a dozen severed human heads, each chemically preserved and shrunken to the size of grapefruit.  Smells pretty bad.

name: Cornu Of The Demonspawn
description: This is a truly massive horn. You heft it with some difficulty and examine the piece. It appears to be made from the severed spiral horn of some extremely large beast, and is shod with heavy black iron. You consider winding it, but a strange sense of dread grows on your mind, and you stay your hand.

name: Scroll Of Zap Undead
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Zap Undead.

name: Fletched Bolt
description: A fletched steel crossbow bolt.

name: Djembe Drum
description: This is a small wooden drum, rope-tuned, skin-covered and designed to be played with the bare hands. A primitive instrument, to be sure, but one capable of raising a powerful rhythm. Carved on the body of this one you find the odd runes "Anke bÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂ¯ÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂ¿ÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂ½".

name: Long Steel Rails
description: A pair of long, heavy steel rails.

name: Sunbite Berry
description: Small, plum-coloured berries from the Sunbit bush. They are slightly tart with a hint of spice and give a warm, tingling sensation when eaten.

name: Kwai
description: This wicked, broad bladed knife is the weapon of choice for members of the Ichiba Thieves Guild.

name: Book Of Element Shield
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Leopardskin Halter
description: A striking halter top made from fine leopard pelt. Makes you feel beautiful, mysterious and confident.

name: Grimoire Of Freeze All
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Light Crossbow
description: A simple short stock straight prod crossbow. Form follows function.

name: Stuka
description: The quality of this piece is evident at first glance, and hefting it you discover that it fairly hums with power in your hands.

name: Trapper's Trousers
description: At first glance these faded quilt leggings are notable only for the unsually large number of pockets they possess.

name: Rose Petals
description: Red rose petals, fresh and fragant. An acquired taste.

name: Steam Cannon
description: This deadly weapon is powered by a minaturised battery and uses a hydraulic system mounted on your back to build up a high pressure head of steam, which you can unleash in a fearsome blast over your hapless foes.

name: Hunter Arrow
description: Arrows with wide, flesh tearing hunter tips.

name: Rhinablade
description: This gigantic bastard sword is razor sharp and prodigiously heavy - it is a truly deadly weapon, if you are two and a half meters tall and strong enough to wield it. Some kind of complicated insignia that you don't recognise adorns the hilt.

name: Fey Pipes
description: This small set of pan pipes is fashioned from thick reed bodies, somewhat simple and crude. Blowing air over the inlet, however, produces a haunting and disturbing resonance that makes your hair stand on end.

name: Crushed Widows
description: Deadly poisonous powder made from spider venom.

name: Ring Of Legends
description: A cool silver ring, ancient and wise.

name: Napalm Bomb
description: Fire that keeps on burning.

name: Book Of Noxious Fumes
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Short Sword
description: A short bladed sword, useful for close quarters melee.

name: Spear Of Fuchai
description: A plain, long hafted war spear, decorated with a green tassle. The wide steel head bears some kind of runic inscription, reading "King Fuchai of Wu made for his personal use, this spear."

name: Pandora's Wand
description: Be careful what you let out of the box.

name: Scroll Of Turn Undead
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Turn Undead.

name: Halberd
description: A long pole arm, culminating in an axe blade topped with an iron spike opposed by a wicked hook for grappling mounted foes.

name: Mahou Katana
description: A fine long blade, cool and bright, blessed by kami of earth and wind.

name: Large Battery
description: A large bank of capacitors capable of storing and discharging a significant electric charge.

name: Ring Of Felix
description: A slim silver ring, imbued with mysterious enchantments.

name: Ankh Of Might
description: A mighty ankh of strength.

name: Heroic Plate (U)
description: The upper portion of a suite of heavy plate armour. The pieces are unusually thick and chunky - in particular the neck is ringed with giant, exaggerated pauldrons and the look is completed with huge spikey brassarts.

name: Coil Of Copper Wire
description: A large coil of unshielded 1.5mm solid copper wire, firm but flexible.

name: Potion Of Invisibility
description: A potion to make you vanish.

name: Harpoon
description: Throwing spears with a nasty barbed heads. There's a ring at the end for attaching a rope, but you decide against that tactic.

name: Bipennis
description: A large, heavy double headed axe. You're going to need both hands to wield this thing, but people that you hit are unlikely to get up again.

name: Bronze Cuirass
description: A bright bronze cuirass, cast to resemble a muscular male torso.

name: Deadly Ring
description: You stare in fascination at this beautiful golden ring. Seduction oozes from it. You feel an overwhelming and alarming compulsion to put it on your finger.

name: Cascade
description: This naginata appears to be crafted of solid platinum. You suspect it may be magical.

name: Francisca
description: Throwing axes with distinctly arch-shaped heads, widening toward the cutting edge and terminating in a prominent point at both the upper and lower corners.

name: Bronze Greaves
description: Calf fitting bronze greaves, polished and glinting in the sun.

name: Telescoping Lance
description: This lance has been designed in segments that loosly extend and retract. Fully extended it is almost six meters long, fully retracted it measures just under a meter. It's completely useless as a weapon, but perhaps you can find something else to do with it.

name: Emerald Robes
description: A magic robe of shimmering green silk. You look just smashing in it.

name: Manual Of Magic
description: The definitive work on modern magical theory, written by famous sorcerer William R.P. Archibald. This rare, leather bound edition includes a preface by Magnus Theodosius, Dean of Magical Theory And Practice at the famous University of Santhir.

name: Ring Of Power
description: A golden ring that surges with magical energy.

name: Miranda's Tiara
description:
You have often
Begun to tell me what I am, but stopp'd
And left me to a bootless inquisition,
Concluding 'Stay: not yet.'

name: Cross Of Turning
description: A cross to smite the living dead.

name: Small Battery
description: A bank of capacitors capable of storing and discharging an electric charge.

name: Suneate And Haidate
description: Leather and splint reinforced greaves with matching thigh protecting haidate. Not very ergonomic to run in, but provides quite good protection.

name: Lion Claw
description: The claw of a fearsome lion, still razor sharp.

name: Scroll Of Armourplate
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Armourplate.

name: Haramaki Do
description: A fine splint mail cuirass that opens up the back, stylish and tough, complete with matching sode and kote.

name: Scroll Of Crush
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Crush.

name: Forest Cape
description: A stealthy cape, stylish in forest green.

name: Giant's Sword
description: This massive sword is nearly three meters long. You hesitate before tring to lift it, pondering whether it is intended as some kind of stage prop or sculpture rather than a real weapon. But the edge is keen and in the right hands this could be devastating.

name: Enchanted Mail (L)
description: A shimmering, magical pair of chainmail chausses.

name: Gold Nugget
description: It's got some gold in it. Which makes it heavy and good in a sling.

name: Chemical Flash
description: Once you ignite the volatile chemicals in this device, the illumination will be focussed by the parabolic mirror into a blinding flash of light.

name: Maenad's Lance
description: "Honey trickles down from the thyrsus made of the wood of the ivy, they gird themselves with snakes and give suck to fawns and wolf cubs as if they were infants at the breast. Fire does not burn them. No weapon of iron can wound them, and the snakes harmlessly lick up the sweat from their heated cheeks. Fierce bulls fall to the ground, victims to numberless, tearing female hands, and sturdy trees are torn up by the roots with their combined efforts."

name: Clockwork Spider
description: This small clockwork spider is no bigger than your hand. Once wound up via a key on it's back, it will go skitter around swiftly and stealthily for as much as five minutes. You have cunningly programmed the gears so as to use it to steal items from unwary shopkeepers...

name: Enchanted Broadsword
description: This fine broadsword has been consecrated by a high priest.

name: Tartan Kilt
description: A heavy tartan kilt.

name: Gossamer Gown (U)
description: The upper portion of a set of delicate gossamer robes, woven from the intricate webs of shy dew spiders deep in the enchanted forests of Faerie.

name: Deathmail
description: This infamous suite of armour was cursed by a long dead deity. Beware it's deadly embrace.

name: Ankh Of Healing
description: A warm ankh of healing.

name: Powered Exoskeleton (L)
description: Integrated with a steam powered hydraulic system, this hard steel exoskeleton augments the wearer in a number of different ways.

name: Dark Wings
description:
Dark wings they are descending
See shadows gathering around
One by one they are falling
Every time they try to strike us down

name: Sword Of Four Winds
description: Angular runes march down the blade of this enchanted claymore: invocations of the north wind for strength, the south wind for cunning, the east wind for speed and the west wind for courage.

name: Seagull
description: It is said that this rusty halberd was the only item that Sagar of Minilum managed to steal from the legendary vaults of the King Under The Sea, as he armed himself with it when discovered and hard pressed by the King's marmelukes. The salt smell of the sea still lingers on it.

name: Assegai
description: A light one handed spear with a wide, sharp blade; just the thing for some savage close range cut and thrust.

name: Steel Helm
description: A sturdy steel helm, good at deflecting blows to the cranium.

name: Mirror Armour
description: A heavy steel breastplate, burnished so bright that it reflects even your enemies damage back at them.

name: Potion Of Barkskin
description: A potion to harden your skin.

name: Buckler Shield
description: A small shield held in the off-hand.

name: Black Gown Of Death (L)
description: Sinister, billowing black robes coverd with spidery runes of bale and bane. Wear at your own peril.

name: Phrygian Cap
description: A soft conical cap with the top pulled forward, worn in antiquity by the inhabitants of Phrygia, a region of central Anatolia. In sculpture, paintings and caricatures it represents freedom and the pursuit of liberty.

name: Aqua Shield
description: A round wooden shield, this item smells faintly of the sea.

name: Hiraken
description: Wheel-like eight-pointed throwing stars.

name: Ring Of Life
description: A ruby ring that surges with joyous life.

name: Thieves Dagger
description: This bloodstained dagger has been a tool of skulduggery on many dark nights. Passed down through eight generations of thieves, now it rests in your hands.

name: Brimstone Ring
description: A warm gold ring, enchanted with spells of fire and heat.

name: Poison Dagger
description: A dread dagger, drenched in dire venom.

name: Sparkle Stix
description: Discharging one of these unleashes a bolt of electricity at your enemies.

name: Clockwork Watchdog
description: Once you wind this nifty brass dog up, it will keep watch over your party while they sleep.

name: Displacer Robe
description: Cunningly enchanted robes, the colour of which is hard to determine...

name: Grimoire Of Ruin
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Kontarion
description: An enchanted heavy cavalry lance. You should probably be using this from horseback.

name: Grimoire Of Curing
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Demolition Stix
description: You notice some fine print down the side of each of these fragile stixs: "Handle with care. Orientate away from self when invoking. Use at own risk."

name: Filcher's Band
description: The bracers of thieves.

name: Barbed Net
description: This extremely large and bulky wire net has hundreds of wicked barbs. You have no doubt that it would make a useful weapon if you could somehow drape it over your foes, but it is too unwieldy to throw by hand.

name: Knock Pick
description: Useful for unlocking doors and disarming traps.

name: Script Of Insect Swarm
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Ring Of Speed
description: A warm ruby ring. The world slows down around you as you slip it on your finger.

name: Air Purifier
description: This device forces the air around you air through a particulate filter, scrubbing it of most harmful particles.

name: Bone Necklace
description: A barbaric necklace of bone fragments.

name: Feather Dart
description: Heavy iron war darts, fashionable with certain types of adventurers. Quite handy in a scrap, but you're not going to be bringing down any elephants with these.

name: Yuuki Sashimono
description: A silk sashimono on a willow frame, mounted on your back. It bears mystic kanji to empower your party.

name: Bottle Of Old Jake's
description: An enjoyably fresh and nutty ale.

name: Scroll Of Enchanted Blade
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Enchanted Blade.

name: Bands Of Artemis
description: Leather braces blessed by the goddess of the hunt.

name: Book Of Spooks
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Death Prow
description: Death Prow was once wielded by the necromancer Oppna.  It is an unwieldy single bladed axe, generously inscribed with runes of death and ruin.

name: Mitre De Sanct
description: A blessed mitre to protect your head.

name: Book Of Dazzling Lights
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Garland Of Roses
description: A garland of fragrant roses, you are wreathed in an aura of grace.

name: Cloak Of Perception
description: A perceptive cape.

name: Oilskin Cloak
description: A slick, heavy oilskin cloak to keep you dry in wet weather.

name: Emerald Ring
description: A fine ring, adorned with a large emerald.

name: Monkey Finger
description: The petrified digit of a monkey.

name: Moser's Mojo Tea
description: Delicately flavoured iced green tea.

name: Dwarven Thrower
description: Hammers designed for throwing by dwarves. For some reason they seem to work better.

name: Golden Rod
description: A blessed wand of pure gold.

name: Dust Of Defection
description: Dust that magically changes the allegiance of your opponent.

name: Scroll Of Fireball
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Ball of Fire.

name: Script Of Fear
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Oxblood Talisman
description: A small talisman containing a drop of ox blood, enchanted with spells of healing and vitality.

name: Poison Dart
description: Darts, smeared with poison. Nasty.

name: Rallying Horn
description: A loud ivory horn for rallying your allies.

name: Patchwork Coat
description: A striking patchwork coat, brightly coloured and decorated with velvet, silk and felt.

name: Potion Of Restoration
description: A potion with great healing powers.

name: Metaphysics Of The Maze
description: This book is an attempt at describing the structure of the Maze. Sadly, other than detailed descriptions the first two Realms there is precious little that is authoritative. On the Second Realm, the text notes that the wilderness areas are inhabited by "seven deadly spirits", and that those wishing to pass the Gate must "find and duly slay them". It paints a picture of the Third Realm as a world of darkness dominated by a ruined city and a band of evil knights. Of the Fourth Realm and others it does little more than list various rumours, most of which you have heard before. The book claims that there are twenty Realms in the Maze, but is unclear what lies beyond. And on the origins of your prison, it has sadly little more than speculation.

name: Mephit Portal
description: The spinning coils of this odd device open a wormhole to another dimension, out of which pour a large number of pesky elemental creatures.

name: Stiletto
description: A long knife with a thin triangular profiled blade.

name: Cameo Locket
description: A dashing golden locket.

name: Dryadic Staff
description: A magical staff, cut from a branch of faerie hawthorn.

name: Scroll Of Knock Knock
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Knock Knock.

name: Clockwork Head
description: The severed copper plated head of a gnomish clockwork servant. The cracked crystal eyes are cold and dead, and wires and hydraulic tubes trail from the neck casing.

name: Skullcap
description: A tight fitting cloth skullcap.

name: Crown Of Vengeance
description: A majestic silver crown. You are encased in a shimmering field of power.

name: Diamondtip
description: Someone has gone overboard ornamenting this rapier - gold, diamonds and gilt adorn it's length.

name: Goatfoot Boots
description: Worn looking goatskin boots, these will keep you going in tough situations.

name: Grimoire Of Hurricane
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Potion Of Cure Paralysis
description: A potion to cure paralysis.

name: Garland Of Lilies
description: A garland a colourful lilies picked from the banks of a silver pool in a secret forest grove.

name: Displacer Cloak
description: This potent magical cape shifts you partly out of this plane.

name: Spear
description: A simple wooden hafted, steel tipped spear, useful for keeping your foes at more than an arms length.

name: C.O.C Paper Slip
description: A small scrap of paper that you tore off the notice board outside the Ichiba Chamber Of Commerce. It bears a very brief text: "18"

name: Tamahagane
description: Forged from black sand under the April sun, this slender katana never loses it's deadly edge.

name: Buskins
description: A stylish pair of soft leather boots of the sort that is always in fashion where you come from.

name: Suede Doublet
description: A comfortable suede garment that will keep you warm out of doors.

name: Horsemans Axe
description: A heavy single bladed war axe with a long metal shaft and a nice leather strap for your wrist. Perfect for splitting the skulls of peasant irregulars from the back of your steed.

name: Death Bomb
description: Detonates into an evil, lingering cloud that devours your foes whole.

name: The Motivator
description: This device will get your team performing at maximum efficiency in no time.

name: Philosopher's Shield
description: A small, thoughtful shield.

name: Potion Of Heroism
description: A potion to inspire you to heroic acts.

name: Stone Armband
description: Armbands of stone, primitively decorative.

name: Angel's Tongue
description:
"Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels, and have not charity, I am become as a sounding brass, or a tinkling cymbal. And though I have the gift of prophecy, and understand all mysteries, and all knowledge; and though I have all faith, so that I could remove mountains, and have not charity, I am nothing. And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor, and though I give my body to be burned, and have not charity, it profiteth me nothing."
 ~ 1 Corinthians 13

name: Ring Of Deftness
description: A finely cut emerald ring.

name: Serpent Stone
description: These jagged sling stones are coated with deadly poison extracted from the fangs of the emerald spider.

name: Lyre Of Legends
description: A finely tuned lyre, perfect for regaling your companions with songs of the legendary heroes of yesteryear.

name: Faded Diary
description:
This small book appears to be the personal diary of one Bucyan of Hail. It chronicles most of the last year of the city.

You thumb through the entries - most consist of reports of food shortages, bad weather, battles with a variety of foes including "giant stalking insects", "the unliving" and "swarms of flying reptiles", and the defence of the city falling further and further back. It seems to you that the people of Hail fought a losing battle for a very long time against all that the Maze could throw at them.

Paging to the final entry, you read:

"16 May: I hear fighting in the streets. I have barricaded myself in the library, it is too late to leave now. A Dragon has come against us, I saw it descend in flames and smoke on the town hall, crushing the building. Damla fell in battle with it, she was the last of our heroes. I do not know who is still alive, but there cannot be many. I wish I had lived to see the sun one more time, but the Maze has covered us in darkness for over a year now. It has taken even that from us, here at the end."

name: White Standard
description: An unfurled banner, argent unadorned.

name: Silver Gloves
description: A pair of princely silver gauntlets, magically hardened so that you can look stylish while being safe too.

name: Talc Of Tamaris
description: Anything that you coat with this mysterious powder becomes remarkably hard to see.

name: Grimoire Of Hex
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Chamois Skirt
description: A soft leather skirt, cut short for unhindered mobility.

name: Ring Of Regeneration
description: A pulsing emerald ring.

name: Sathuli Tulwar
description: A large two handed tulwar, the strength to wield one is considered a rite of passage in the barbaric tribe that forged it.

name: Codex Of Falling Stars
description: A rare codex bearing the inscrutable mysteries of an epic feat of magic. The scuffed and faded leaves are filled with dire warnings and cautions.

name: Potion Of Demonic Aspect
description: A potion to cloak you in a demonic illusion.

name: Ring Of Reflextion
description: A light emerald ring, buzzing with power.

name: Book Of Call Plants
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Searchlight
description: The illumination cast by a bright halogen lamp is focussed by the parabolic reflector into a dazzling beam of light. It will certainly help you spot stealthy foes, and probably have some effect on darkness-loving creatures.

name: Sai
description: A three pronged weapon; the central prong is sharpened to a deadly point.

name: Disruptor
description: A large electrum mace, enchanted with spells to disrupt the living dead.

name: Script Of Stamina
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Water Wings
description: Odd winged sandals, sopping wet. You just can't seem to get them dry.

name: Capacitor
description: A simple chemical capacitor, used for storing a charge.

name: Amulet Of Life
description: Aan enchanted amulet of resurrection.

name: Aspis
description: A bowl shaped wooden shield, faced with a thin layer of beaten bronze.

name: Rock Salt Amulet
description: This odd amulet contains a glass bulb filled with fine white salt. It was given to you by Sir Kay.

name: Gown (L) Of Divine Mail
description: Blessed chainmail, to protect and heal.

name: Book Of Cure Paralysis
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Granite Ring
description: A cold granite ring, enchanted with spells of hardening.

name: Scroll Of Identify
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Identify.

name: Amulet Of Asphixiation
description: An cold sapphire amulet of vacuum.

name: Prismic Shield Generator
description: You don't really believe in magic, and this device bears you out by generating pretty multi-coloured arcs of prismically dispersed light. Harmless as they are they still serve to thwart a variety of allegedly magical effects, thus proving the essentially imaginary nature of such phenomena.

name: Scorpion Tail
description: The tail of some large black scorpion.

name: Rock Of Reflection
description: A cold black stone, you can feel your life energy being drawn slowly out as you hold it.

name: Pilum
description: Fine two meter throwing spears, wooden hafts with a long metal shank.

name: Tsunami Bomb
description: Detonates a giant tsunami over your foes.

name: Granite Talisman
description: A small talisman, enchanted with spells of defense.

name: Crusader Coif
description: A mail coif, covering your head, neck and shoulders.

name: Scroll Of Wall Of Force
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Wall Of Force.

name: Silk Pantaloons
description: Closed breeches, each leg done in cheerfully bright colours.

name: Horsemans Mace
description: A long hafted mace designed for use from horseback.

name: Ring Of The Road
description: A classy sapphire ring, handy for travellers.

name: Frontier Phaser
description: A compact, ruggedised firearm of some sort. It bears a red eye-in-triangle crest that you do not recognise.

name: Dys Gaf
description: This heavy flail is made of stone - granite handle and weights are joins by rusty iron chains. Spidery runes in an unknown script run down the grip.

name: Targe
description: A light round shield made from plywood and tough cowhide. This one has been colourfully painted with barbaric swirling patterns.

name: Bottled Mephits
description: Uncorking this bottle releases a swarm of elemental sprites to fight for you.

name: Armour Piercer
description: Wooden arrows with tips designed for armour penetration.

name: Steam Powered Hydraulics
description: This bulky device is a collection of pipes, pistons, gears and switches that is powered by a micro battery pack and a water reservoir used to generate steam. On it's own it doesn't do much, but perhaps you can find a way to harness the power.

name: Fang
description: This deadly black blade has seen far more battles than you.

name: Amulet Of The Moon
description: A serene sapphir amulet, spilling purple magic.

name: Raven's Bill
description: A deadly black halberd, dripping with sinister venom.

name: Zatoichi Bo
description: The enchanted staff of the mythical monk Zatoichi Shimozawa.

name: Ring Pro Frost
description: A slim silver ring, enchanted with spells of frost.

name: Cloak Of Capricorn
description: A shimmering, magical cape.

name: Grimoire Of Faith
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Stone Pro Airs
description: A jagged blue stone, oozing enchantment.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: These deadly magic quarrels crackle with electricity.

name: Bone Dust
description: The crushed and powdered bones of your enemies, enchanted with spiteful spells of hopelessness and despair.

name: Miriam's Rag Doll
description: You found this crude patchwork doll amongst the belongings of Miriam Marrowsucker. You've seen better doll work than this rather sad creation, all rough stitching and mismatched button eyes.

name: Wrist Mounted Flamer
description: A small thumb activated flamer on these reticulated steel gloves spews deadly Greek Fire from a pressurised tank mounted on your back.

name: Gossamer Gown (L)
description: The lower portion of a set of delicate gossamer robes, woven from the intricate webs of shy dew spiders deep in the enchanted forests of Faerie.

name: Scroll Of Confusion
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Confusion.

name: Hydromancer's Ring
description: A shiny silver ring, imprisoning a swirling water nereid.

name: Muramasa Blade
description: A katana forged by the legendary smith Muramasa, the most skillful smith of his age but the owner of a violent and ill-balanced mind verging on madness. Some legends say that his temper passed into the blades he made, which hunger for blood and war, and ultimately impel their bearer to commit murder or suicide...

name: Mindblast Rod
description: A light metal staff, topped with a crackling yellow sphere just waiting to be discharged.

name: Quilt Tunic
description: A padded quilt tunic, somewhat travel worn and faded but still capable of keeping you warm and cushioning the odd blow.

name: Potion Of Guardian Angel
description: A potion to protect you from harm.

name: Chain Hauberk
description: A mail shirt, sleeved and long enough to reach your thighs.

name: Kite Shield
description: A large kite shield, made from layers of light wood and tough leather.

name: Book Of Knock Knock
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Dragon Plate (U)
description: The upper portion of an enchanted suit of red steel plate armour. Fine acid etchings of dragons cover the piece.

name: Getsel's Bone Comb
description: A crude bone comb, you have a sneaking suspicion that it has been fashioned from the jaw of human skull. After slaying the hag Getsel Gnawtooth, you discovered it tangled in her filthy hair.

name: Jazeraint Skirt
description: A short leather skirt, covered with shiny steel plates.

name: Anger
description: This broad bladed dagger was given to the adventurer Kane by the demon Usark in exchange for a pint of sand stolen from the impenetrable Emerald Palace.

name: Armet
description: A skull-fitting visored steel armet.

name: Claymore
description:
Many's the lad fought on that day,
Well the Claymore could wield,
When the night came, silently lay
Dead in Culloden's field.
 ~ The Skye Boat Song

name: Spike Stone
description: Spiked stones for use in a sling.

name: Fire Stix
description: Rapid fire magical energy streams towards your foes.

name: Tartan Trews
description: Tight fitting cloth pants, in extremely fasionable tartan.

name: Mana Stone
description: A jagged blue stone, oozing enchantment.

name: Amulet Of Healing
description: A potent amulet of healing.

name: Argyll Doublet
description: A fine highland tunic, richly decorated and comfortable.

name: Quarterstaff
description: A head-high smoothed stave intended to be used in combat.

name: Pipes Of Doom
description: This rather worn, scruffy stand of bagpipes looks unremarkable. The blow pipe, chanter and drones are crafted from some dark wood and the bag is made from faded black cloth. But as soon as you work up a simple tune on it the sonorous and terrifying tones that roll forth dispel any impression that this is an ordinary instrument.

name: Sword Of Hearts
description: This fine blade belonged to a young soldier returning home from foreign wars. Coming back with plans to make amends a woman he once wronged, he found her married into a powerful family - nobility with a dark and dangerous plan to usurp the throne! Joined by a young and cunning thief, he was thrust into a tangled web of intrigue, thrilling action, and the desperate search for justice and love.

name: Potion Of Cure Poison
description: A potion to cure poison.

name: Assassin's Cap
description: A dingy felt hat, the magic of which is not apparent to you until your next game of darts.

name: Ring Of Demons
description: A heavy golden ring bearing a turgid red ruby, attuned to the demonic planes.

name: Cloak Of Fortune
description: A shimmering, magical cape of good fortune.

name: Bourgundian Sallet
description: A beautifully made burgonet helm, embossed and polished, and including a falling facial guard.

name: Green Parrot
description: A cheeky green parrot that perches imperviously on your shoulder. It knows a few words and phrases, mostly dirty.

name: Blades Of Aesir
description: From the frozen wastes of the north, this giant axe has come into your hands. Inscrutable angular runes spider across it's burnished face, and the oddly elongated blades make you doubtful at first of it's balance. But the weapon hums joyfully as you testingly whirl it about your head, and a  chill breeze blows through the air at each mighty stroke.

name: Mandolin Of The Magus
description: This six-course mandolin looks very old, although it was clearly once an expensive piece. The varnished wood is inlaid with gold filligree, and the letters M L B are carved on the neck. Strumming it, you realise the piece is already perfectly tuned, and a complex melody fairly leaps off the strings beneath your fingers.

name: Potion Of Heavy Heal
description: A potion to heal serious wounds.

name: Rocket Stix
description: A giant bolt lightning is conjured by these potent magical stix.

name: Tinker's Carryall Bracers
description: Stout leather forearm bracers, for the working man.

name: Bunch Of Bananas
description: Tasty yellow bananas for you to eat.

name: Hail Bomb
description: This bomb scatters icy hailstones.

name: Leather Boots
description: A pair of tough all-weather leather boots; footwear for the savvy traveller.

name: Dragon Rod
description: You found this solid gold, gem encrusted rod in the hoard of the dragon Igor. It is nearly half a meter long, and the far end has been shaped into a snarling dragon head.

name: Phobia Cap
description: A bright, embroidered skullcap. You feel somewhat uneasy handling this item.

name: Acid Bomb
description: Engulfs your foes in an acidic cloud.

name: Scroll Of Blink
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Blink.

name: Fur Tunic
description: A sleeved tunic, fashioned from authentic animal fur for that noble savage look.

name: Scrymgeour's Bitter
