description: A pint of bitter, brewed on the premises at the Adventurer's Inn by Scrymgeour. Full bodied and moderately hopped, with a dark amber colour and a generous frothy head. It veritably slides down, leaving you wanting more.

name: Beggars Pants
description: This ragged pair of pants is stained with filth and crawling with fleas. City dwellers will avoid you like the plague.

name: Adventurer's Armoury Key
description: A key to a room at Scrymgeours Adventurer's Armoury.

name: Cloak Of Many Colours
description: A shimmering magical cape, it's hard to tell exactly what colour this garment is.

name: Necromatic Helm
description: A full faced steel great helm, lighter and better ventilated than normal for use in hot climates.

name: Brooch Of Heroism
description: This tiny gold brooch is the badge of great deeds.

name: McCavity Ale
description: The label on this bottle depicts a scruffy man wielding a large axe, alongside the words "McCavity Ale. Try It If You're A Fookin Hard Bastard". The pitch black ale has a smooth white head and a heavy malty taste, an uncultured brew, but strong and tasty.

name: Earthshaker Bomb
description: The very gound will heave under your feet. This is more than just a firework.

name: Demilitarised Clockwork Head
description: The severed copper plated head of a gnomish clockwork servant. The cracked crystal eyes are cold and dead, and wires and hydraulic tubes trail from the neck casing.

name: Mindread Wand
description: This crystal wand is good at reading minds.

name: Winged Boots
description: Some wag has painted a crude depiction of wings on these soft leather boots.

name: Halogen Lamp
description: A portable tungsten filament halogen lamp, powered by a minaturised battery pack.

name: Dragonhide Cloak
description: A tough, scaly cape made of dragon hide.

name: Ghola Coin
description: This heavy golden coin is embossed with a hexagonal pattern of bones, and has a small hole in the middle. The monster Ghul was wearing it on a leather thong around his neck.

name: Granite Potion
description: A potion to harden your skin.

name: Crook
description: A large shepherds crook, heavy enough to deal out a solid blow.

name: Ninja Garb (U)
description: A long sleeved black cotton jacket.

name: Kavalireco
description: A silver broadsword, light and deadly.

name: Chamail Doublet
description: A soft quilt tunic, covered with magical patterns of protection.

name: Ring Of Sanity
description: A silver ring of sanity and order.

name: Breastplate
description: A shiny steel breastplate. Protects your vital organs without limiting mobility too much.

name: Potion Of Cure Stone
description: A potion to cure petrification.

name: Staff Of Charming
description: A magic staff, embued with spells of charming and friendship.

name: Iron Circlet
description: A crude iron circlet.

name: Chain Chausses
description: Mail chausses, offering flexible protection for your legs.

name: Vampire Chain
description: At first glance nothing more than a rusted length of heavy iron chain, this is actually a fearsome enchanted weapon.

name: Codex Of Blizzard
description: A rare codex bearing the inscrutable mysteries of an epic feat of magic. The scuffed and faded leaves are filled with dire warnings and cautions.

name: Ta-li Stone
description: Deadly, enchanted sling stones.

name: Blood Diamond
description: An amulet ensorcelled with spells of war and ruin.

name: Koga Headband
description: A headband from a famous ninja clan.

name: Ankh Of Speed
description: A shimmering ankh of speed.

name: Flak Cannon
description: This hefty cannon operates by detonating an explosive flak shell in the barrel, launching shrapnel forward in a deadly shotgun pattern with a deafening roar.

name: Angelic Essence
description: Summons an angel to fight for you.

name: Jade Jian
description: Amazingly, this jian appears to be made of solid jade.

name: Crusader Banner
description: A somewhat tattered banner, still proudly fluttering.

name: Iron Helm
description: A sturdy iron helm, good at deflecting blows to the cranium.

name: Broadsword
description: A heavy broad bladed one handed arming sword in the traditional cruciform style. The weapon of choice for the flower of chivalry.

name: Script Of Striking
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Electric Eye
description: A small battery powered optical device.

name: Pneumatic Boots
description: An air powered piston integrated into these boots can be released to give you a boost when required.

name: Welding Goggles
description: Thick brass welding goggles with tinted glass lenses that provide your eyes some measure of protection from sparks, debris and radiation.

name: Al-Khydr's Grimoire
description: This ancient book is bound in faded leather, mahogany and copper. The leather of the front cover is scored with a striking motif of a bearded face with closed eyes surrounded by tangled leaves and vines. The fragile pages within are crammed with text in a flowing, looping script that you cannot read.

name: Potion Of Snakespeed
description: A potion to greatly speed you up.

name: Crusader Helm
description: A full faced steel great helm, lighter and better ventilated than normal for use in hot climates.

name: Ring Of Protection
description: A plain silver ring, enchanted for your defence.

name: Pointed Hat
description: A felt hat that rises in a sharp conical point. You like it because it makes you look taller.

name: Charming Wand
description: This crystal wand is good at changing minds.

name: Ankh Of Wonder
description: This golden ankh flashes with unbearable brightness.

name: Charged Armour
description: This highly charged armour damages any who strike you.

name: Magic Nectar
description: A potion to recharge your magical energy.

name: Forest Cap
description: An tough phrygian cap, enchanted with incantations of stealth and camouflage.

name: Jeweled Amulet
description: This small amulet is gaudily adorned with cheap precious stones. Is clearly very old. Ancient, in fact.

name: Black Blood
description: A glass vial containing some disgusting looking black blood. You found this in the lair of the vampire Rhys.

name: Vex Bow
description: A nasty piece of work this.

name: Geomancer's Ring
description: A heavy gold ring, imprisoning a brooding earth spirit.

name: Bullwhip
description: A large single-tailed whip made of braided leather. This one has been dyed black.

name: Spiked Spear
description: A heavy spear with a nasty looking barbed head.

name: Longsword
description: A long bladed infantry sword of the type popular with adventurers everywhere, versatile enough to be used one or two handed.

name: Book Of Invisible Stalker
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Pennywhistle
description: A small somewhat battered tin penny whistle, six holed and pre-tuned to D. At first an unremarkable looking piece, only when you whistle up a quick ditty do you feel the enchantment that lurks within. Your feet start a-tapping and your spirit soars at the clear golden notes that drop from the tiny instrument.

name: Black Gown Of Death (U)
description: Sinister, billowing black robes coverd with spidery runes of bale and bane. Wear at your own peril.

name: Gleaming Sword
description: A brightly polished longsword.

name: Grimoire Of Cure Stone
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Jonga Powder
description: Strong muti, used to dispel evil spirits.

name: Death Shroud
description: This dark, bloodstained cloak smells like death and decay.

name: Devil Stone
description: Deadly, enchanted sling stones.

name: Lyre Of Cakes
description: This is a small hand held lyre with silver strings and a frame made from pale wood. In low light, you observe that it glows with a faint white light. Carved on the sound box you find the mysterious words "Let them eat cake".

name: Potion Of Mod Heal
description: A potion to sooth moderate wounds.

name: Dragonslayer
description: A two handed sword, just over two meters long. You need equipment this size if you're going after dragons.

name: Aenen Sundew
description: A small glass bottle of gnomish liquor. The label says "SUNDEW", along with a blazing-sun motif. Opening it to take a sniff of the clear golden liquid, your eyes start watering and your sinuses burn. Whatever is in here is strong stuff.

name: Fur Halter
description: A sleeveless halter top, made from rather cheap fur.

name: Thieves Ring
description: A bright ruby ring, the spoils of a legendary theft.

name: Mushkila
description: A large, heavy two handed hammer. Sometimes the blunt approach is best.

name: Kanzen Sashimono
description: A silk sashimono on a willow frame, mounted on your back. It bears mystic kanji to empower your party.

name: Resurrection Powder
description: Enchanted dust for bringing the dead back to life.

name: Pandemonium Powder
description: Magical dust, tossing it in the air causes all hell to break loose.

name: Leather Leggings
description: Hardened leather pants, tough but quite sweaty in hot weather.

name: Script Of Web
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Pneumatic Gloves
description: A cunningly integrated air powered piston in these gloves lets you pack an unexpected punch.

name: Jesters Staff
description: A short stick decorated with a grinning doll head.

name: Kabuto
description: A lacquer painted steel open faced kabuto, including several  colourful datemono crests.

name: Elven Bow
description: Enchanted for a century in a white tower in an elven castle deep in the First Realm, this willowy longbow is as deadly as it is elegant.

name: Jeweled Armet
description: A dazzling bejeweled silver armet, glittering in the ambient light.

name: Shield of Ice
description: A round shield conjured out of freezing ice.

name: Lord's Garb
description: Glittering steel plate armour, fit for only the noblest of wearers.

name: Book Of Haste
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Tarnished Sword
description: This old sword is badly tarnished and rusty, and otherwise unremarkable.

name: Potion Of Heavy Stamina
description: A potion to reduce fatigue.

name: Midnight Choir
description: This appears to be a large, finely crafted open harp. The darkly burnished wooden frame is inlaid with silver and amethyst worked in fine spiderweb patterns. The strings, fashioned of some inky substance that you cannot at once identitify, are cold and smooth to the touch. Running your hand across them and drawing out a single seductive note, it seems as if a cool breeze suddenly stirs your hair and the sun is momentarily darkened in the sky... then the moment passes, and all about you is still.

name: Oscillistor
description: A semiconductor device, consisting of a semiconductor specimen placed in magnetic field, and a resistor after a power supply. The device produces high-frequency oscillations which are very close to sinusoidal.

name: Fur Leggings
description: Leggings made from the fur of some cold-climate beast. Warm and provide some protection in combat.

name: Cherry Bomb
description: Blazing fireballs burn opponents within the range of the detonation spot.

name: Potion Of Light Heal
description: A potion to sooth minor wounds.

name: Burgonet
description: An open faced steel helm, including several blow-deflecting hinges. This one does not have a visor attached.

name: Utilikilt
description: A lightweight, comfortable cotton kilt that comes with deep and functional side saddle cargo pockets. A simple, practical garment for the working man who demands comfort and utility in equal measure.

name: Dust Of Banishment
description: Enchanted dust, it expels summoned creatures back to their home plane.

name: Potion Of Stamina
description: A potion to reduce fatigue.

name: Gloves Of Myrdall
description: Beautifully made scaled electrum gloves, fine and flexible enough that you can win a game of tiddlywinks while wearing them.

name: Book Of Deadly Poison
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Flashbang
description: This primitive bomb will create a large anount of noise and smoke and a blindingly bright flash.

name: Flambard
description: A large two handed sword with a cutting blade that had been forged with undulating edges.

name: Scroll Of Call Treant
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Call Treant.

name: Cat Paw
description: The preserved paw of a small cat.

name: Flechette
description: Wickedly sharp darts, these yearn to be buried in the flesh of your enemies.

name: Bascinet
description: A steel bascinet, sans visor.

name: Main Guache
description: A dagger with an oversized guard, intended as a specialised off-hand weapon.

name: Electrified Sword
description: Hooked up to a high voltage transformer, this large metal sword discharges a jolting electrical shock into anything that you hit. Handle with care.

name: Mystic Spear
description: A masterwork longspear - light, balanced and deadly.

name: The Compendium Of Classic Poetry
description: This large work claims to contain over a "thousand timeless poems" by "many well known poets and sages". It certainly is packed with poetry, none of which you recognise, and some of which is in a language or languages that you do not understand.

name: Puck's Cap
description:
If we shadows have offended,
Think but this, and all is mended,
That you have but slumber'd here
While these visions did appear.
 ~ Puck

name: Pneumatic Lance
description: A large air powered piston drives a telescoping steel spear outwards at a high velocity. This is an unwieldy weapon, but anything you connect with will know all about it.

name: Bearded War Axe
description: A long hafted single bladed war axe with an extended beard that provides a wider cutting surface.

name: Rod Of Sprites
description: The ancient scepter of the Faerie Queen, mysterious and potent.

name: Throwing Hammer
description: Small hammers designed for hurling.

name: Aromatic Salts
description: A bag of exotic, pungent smelling salts

name: Petrified Demon
description: The hideous petrified corpse of a small demon, snarling fearfully even in death.

name: Stone Of Fields
description: A small, glossy stone. Given appropriate magical energy, it generates defensive fields around your party.

name: Parma
description: A round wooden shield, reinforced with an iron frame.

name: Winter Mittens
description: Warm fur gloves, to keep your digits cosy in cold weather.

name: Ringing Shield
description: This gilded, iron re-inforced shield rings loudly with each strike.

name: Bloodwand
description: A fell, black bladed longsword, covered with evil bloodstains. You hear a faint murmouring in the back of your mind as you handle it, urging you gleefully into battle.

name: Golden Breastplate
description: A glowing golden breastplate. You'll stand out in a crowd.

name: Silver Leaf Tobacco
description: This small bag of dried tobacco leaves is fragrant and spicy. A colourful label does indeed depict a silver frond on a dark green background.

name: Birch Amulet
description: A small wooden amulet, for luck.

name: Potion Of Resist Elements
description: A potion to resist elemental magic.

name: Owl Feather
description: A soft, downy owl feather.

name: Singing Sword
description: This slim blade sings as it cuts through the air.

name: Shark Tooth
description: The jagged triangular tooth of some giant shark.

name: Potion Of Razor Cloak
description: A potion of razor cloak.

name: Helazoid Pennant
description: A curious triangular banner featuring a flaming eye on a blue and purple field. Slight charring indicates fire damage at some stage in the past.

name: Gun Halberd
description: A large halberd, integrated with a primitive flintlock firearm. Packs a punch, but tedious to reload.

name: Potion Of Regeneration
description: A potion to boost your healing factor.

name: Staff Of Blessing
description: A blessed staff, embued with spells of protection and warding.

name: Ninja Garb (L)
description: Loose fitting black cotton trousers.

name: Minerva's Tresses
description: A fine war spear, wreathed in flames that are cool to you, but scorch your enemies. Lightning flashes from your eyes and tongues of flame run up your arm as you grasp the haft.

name: Pickmeup Potion
description: A potion to pep you up after a hard day.

name: Battleaxe
description: A fine single bladed axe that has been specially crafted for combat.

name: Baleful Sax
description: The sinuous curves and folds of the body of this gleaming chrome and black lacquer saxophone seem vaguely repulsive to you. You wind it, and the oily, rasping, squeaking sounds of pure malicious evil that slide and slither from it set your mind jangling and your nerves on edge.

name: Mace And Chain
description: A heavy spiked iron mace attached by a length of chain to a short wooden handle. It's an ungainly weapon, but quite effective if you manage to hit anything.

name: Resolve
description: An enchanted mail hauberk.

name: Bec De Corbin
description: A pole arm topped with a heavy hammer and spike combination.

name: Ring Of Truth
description: A shining gold ring, enchanted with spells of truth and beauty.

name: Shade Essence
description: A bag of powdered essence taken from the shades of the dead - powerful muti.

name: Book Of Entwine
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Tanto
description: A single edged knife, wickedly sharp.

name: Mustapha's Pocketwatch
description: A ticking gold pocketwatch, dripping gold magic. You've never seen so many semi-precious stones on one piece of jewelry.

name: Barbed Arrow
description: Arrows with nasty barbed tips.

name: Rock Crystals
description: A handful of miscellaneous mineral crystals.

name: Crab Cakes
description: Tender crab meat cakes.

name: Faerie Stick
description: A gnarled hawthorn wand, enchanted under a full moon with spells of slumber and lethargy.

name: Great Bow
description: An enchanted longbow, strong, accurate and well balanced.

name: Jiyuu Sashimono
description: A silk sashimono on a willow frame, mounted on your back. It bears mystic kanji to empower your party.

name: Amulet Of Cover
description: An amulet to obscure your form.

name: Scroll Of Fear
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Fear.

name: Snow
description: This mystic short spear is finely crafted from silver and bleached driftwood.  Someone has carved three notches near the blade, although you cannot make a mark on the item.

name: Zatoichi's Shikomizue
description: This nondescript bamboo cane conceals deadly secret - a thin straight edged blade that has been forged by a master bladesmith. Carved along the handle of the sword in angular runes you read the words "Darkness is my advantage".

name: Scroll Of Heal All
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Heal All.

name: Midnight Cloak
description: A jet black magic cloak.

name: Shrike Arrow
description: Plain old willow shafted arrows, flighted so that they make a nasty buzzing sound through the air.

name: Woodsman's Axe
description: Just the thing for hacking through some vegetation.

name: Cross Of Purity
description: An untarnishable silver cross, gleaming and pure.

name: Arquebus
description: A clunky low muzzle-velocity arquebus with a matchlock firing mechanism and a crossbow trigger beneath the stock. Not the most reliable of weapons, but it does pack a punch.

name: Detonation Tube
description: Small hollow wands, but they pack a big punch.

name: Lladdedigaeth
description: You heft this fell sword and marvel at it's potence and puissance. The steel blade glows faintly red in the low light, and your hand tingles on the snakeskin hilt.

name: Thieves Tools
description: A bag of thieves tools, for breaking and entering.

name: Ring Of Delphi
description: A glittering ruby ring, beautifully ornate. You feel a gripping compulsion to put this on your finger.

name: Moonstone Ring
description: A silver ring set with a magical moonstone.

name: Diamond Ring
description: A sparkling magical ring of pure diamond.

name: Script Of Theft
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Brooch
description: A small enchanted brooch.

name: Stave Of Silence
description: A magic staff, embued with spells of silence.

name: Raqban
description: A gleaming wootz steel scimitar, with fine gold wire work on the hilt. In your grip it feels perfectly balanced and deadly.

name: Turtleshell Ukulele
description: A nicely made ukulele, wooden body cheerfully decorated with blue feathers, flowers and pieces of turtle shell and bone. You can't wait to try strumming up a jaunty tune.

name: Calthaw
description: A nicely balanced scimitar with a well worn look. The word DORIANS has been crudely scratched into the base of the blade.

name: Bo Stick
description: A tapered bamboo staff, well suited for combat.

name: Dust Of Dessication
description: Magic dust to leech the moisture out of your hapless foes.

name: Black Robe (U)
description: A midnight black robe and cowl.

name: Staff Of Doom
description: The legendary Staff of Doom, infamous throughout the lands. You clutch it in your greedy hands and it thrums with potence and majesty, your hair stands on end under the assault of it's dread aura.

name: Potion Of Lesser Curing
description: Attempts to cure any of the minor conditions of fear, sleep, blindness, nausea and irritation.

name: Brass Legs
description: Pneumatic brass leg coverings. Powered by compressed air, these provide you with augmented agility and strength.

name: Ankh Of Youth
description: A bright ankh of youth.

name: Pyromancer's Ring
description: A burnished gold ring, imprisoning a furious fire elemental.

name: Magma Spear
description: A large spear conjured from smoking magma.

name: Cutlass
description: Just the right weapon to defy your stuffy straight-bladed colleagues and express your rebellious piratical inner self.

name: Warlock's Blade
description: This ornate dagger is warm with magical power. Someone has etched the letters E O K I L on the blade.

name: Recharging Gem
description: A golden stone with bands of black.

name: Brimstone Shield
description: A round wooden shield, this item smells burnt and charred.

name: Strongbow
description: A longbow with an extremely heavy pull. You'll have to work hard to string and draw this.

name: Potion Of Curing
description: A potent potion to cure all types of ailments.

name: Vacuum Pump
description: A small pump that uses several battery driven fans to drive air through a pipe. Can be set to suck or blow.

name: Mail Mittens
description: A pair a mail mittens.

name: Book Of Mirror Image
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Skull Bones
description: Several shards from an ancient human skull, bleached white by the sands of time.

name: Bottlerocket
description: Set these off and point them at your enemies... but not in that order.

name: Ring Of Minds
description: A slim silver ring, enchanted with spells of insight.

name: Spring Powered Catapult
description: A portable handheld catapult powered by a large spring.

name: Red Gold Ring
description: A thick ring of red gold.

name: Script Of Poison
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Manta Roots
description: A clutch of roots from the fabled manta bush.

name: Script Of Mage Shield
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Silver Coin
description: Silver coins

name: Amulet Pro Magic
description: An emerald amulet, sparkling with magical power.

name: Piercing Bolt
description: Slender steel corssbow bolts, just the thing for punching through a heavy breastplate.

name: Ninjato
description: A cheap single edged sword, fitted with a well worn katana handle.

name: Omnigun Mk1
description: A second compression spring adds some punch to the projectiles, and a small metal plate in the barrel allows you to load darts as well as other types of ammunition. Other tweaks have enhanced the performance of the weapon, but you're far from satisfied.

name: Omnigun Mk2
description: Replacing one of the compression springs in the firing mechanism with a torsion spring, you have managed to up the power and add the ability to load throwing knives. You've tweaked the reloading mechanism to both speed up operation and accuracy, as well as to add small amounts of various serums to projectiles. A powerful hallucinogen of your own design is now delivered along with every round.

name: Blarneystone Amulet
description: You'll be the life and soul of the party.

name: Potion Of Haste
description: A potion to speed you up.

name: Gnarled Staff
description: A rough hewn wooden walking staff.  Useful for adding dignity to your gait, clubbing errant apprentices and knocking mysteriously on doors.

name: Omnigun Mk5
description: You have once again managed to increase the efficiency of the spring-based firing system, giving it enough power to punch through most types of armour. You doubt that there is a more powerful spring-based projectile launcher anywhere. You have tweaked the hallucinogen applied to projectiles so that it brings on insanity in addition to other effects. Finally, you have been working on generifying the firing system attachments. For now you can load and fire javelins, but watch this space.

name: Omnigun Mk6
description: You have completed the pluggable firing system on this device, allowing you to load pretty much any type of ammunition. The poison mix applied to projectiles now has a chance of petrifying them, literally. In addition, you have finally perfected a force-conserving reloading gear mechanism, letting you up the firing rate of this fearsome weapon.

name: Omnigun Mk3
description: You have managed to integrate the spring-based firing system with an ingenious rachet mechanism. This enables you to load the weapon with regular bolts and arrows in addition to other supported ammunition varieties. The loading bay is now applying a virulent poison that causes blinding and nausea to all projectiles.

name: Omnigun Mk4
description: Applying rifling to the barrel hasn't been feasible because of the variety of projectile types the system supports, but you have managed to use a clever set of gears to impart rotation on all departing projectiles, thereby increasing accuracy signficantly. A custom-machined attachment to the firing system allows you to load throwing stars, and a dire sedative is now being applied along with the poison/hallucinogen mix already coating your ammunition.

name: Coil Of The Serpent
description: A deadly staff, with a grip shaped like a snakes head.

name: The Guide To Runes
description: As far as you can make out, the this hefty tome says that it defines a method of representing runes from different languages using numbers, and then proceeds to treat over a hundred different alphabets in this way, most of which you've never heard of. It sounds simple enough, but as you begin reading the text it rapidly descends into detailed discussions of logical ordering, sequence equivalence, syllable decomposition, and other semantics. Your eyes glaze over with boredom.

name: Dark December
description: A heavy iron mace, cold to the touch. Grasping it, your mind is momentarily filled with a vision of fire, dancing all around you, beckoning you towards it, fire that you long for with a burning desire... with a gasp you return to the present.

name: Toadskin Wristband
description: A wrist band made from the skin of dead toads.

name: Scarab Necklace
description: A necklace bearing a beetle carved from a single emerald.

name: Infernal Horn
description: This twisted bone horn looks crude and barely functional to you. Putting it to your lips, a sudden thrill of blackest fear blanks your mind. You hesitate, now is perhaps not the time to sound it.

name: Voidstone
description: A cold black stone hacked from the walls of the void; it has an insatiable appetite for heat, light and energy.

name: Throwing Knife
description: Knives. For throwing.

name: High Voltage Transformer
description: A device that transfers electrical energy from one circuit to another through inductively coupled conductors.

name: Walriblade
description: You are slightly intimidated by this huge, chunky blade. Whoever made it clearly felt that size and weight were the most important characteristics of a sword. Still, it is surprisingly well balanced.

name: Silk Shirt
description: A nice silk shirt.  Offers minimal protection but is very fasionable.

name: Script Of Skullduggery
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Thorn Staff
description: Seemingly a simple walking staff cut from a gnarled thorn tree, Glaucus has woven devious gnomish spells around this it.

name: Silver Hammer
description: This solid silver hammer might be made of rather soft metal, but you reckon it will still come off better than your foes following an impact.

name: Script Of Blur
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Mempo
description: A stylised kabuto face mask, in the form of a fearsome snarling demon.

name: Diamond Epee
description: You are amazed to note that this epee appears to be made of solid diamond. It is probably enchanted.

name: Mystic's Ring
description: A shining silver ring, enchanted with spells of insight and penetration.

name: Potion Of Majesty
description: A potion to enhance your stature.

name: Platinum Greaves
description: Fine, shining platinum greaves. You feel like you can run forever.

name: Grimoire Of Dehydrate
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Shield Of Sacrifice
description: You feel like a bit of a target...

name: Mempo Of Death
description: A snarling deaths-head mempo.

name: Ancient Dust
description: Fine powdery white dust, it brings the weight of time down to bear on your foes.

name: Thieves Buckler
description: A light shield, darkened to prevent telltale glints, and including a forearm strap so that you can keep both hands free when necessary.

name: Precision Arrow
description: Weighted arrows, flighted to perfection.

name: Chu-ko-nu
description: A large, clunky crossbow designed to fire more than one quarrel at once.

name: Cracker Stix
description: Discharging one of these unleashes a powerful bolt of electricity at your enemies.

name: Ebony Heaume
description: A large great helm, fashioned from pure ebony and imbued with blessings of solidity and strength.

name: Oberon's Greaves
description:
Then, my queen, in silence sad,
Trip we after the night's shade:
We the globe can compass soon,
Swifter than the wandering moon.

name: Script Of Identify
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Death Star
description: Razor edged steel throwing stars, blackened to prevent telltale glints.

name: Gyroscope
description: A small metal gyroscope. The copper rotor is mounted in brass gimbals and retains it's orientation regardless of any motion of the platform on which it is mounted.

name: Yenluo's Eye
description: You took this small, mult-faceted precious stone from the body of the demon Yenluo.

name: Long Bow
description: A fine bow, handmade from over a meter and a half of mature yew.

name: Ju-Ju Stones
description: A small pile of mysterious black stones.

name: Ankh Of Sanctity
description: A potent ankh of sanctity.

name: Lodestone
description: A large, heavy black stone.

name: Small Clockwork Motor
description: A fist-sized mechanically powered clockwork motor. Winding the key stores energy in a coiled mainspring, which is then released through various gears, cogs and axels.

name: Codex Of Concussion
description: A rare codex bearing the inscrutable mysteries of an epic feat of magic. The scuffed and faded leaves are filled with dire warnings and cautions.

name: Poison Bomb
description: Engulfs your foes in a poisonous cloud.

name: Rhine Stone
description: Small crystaline sling bullets.

name: Bushido Blade
description:
The many-clouds-rising
Izumo Takeru
Wears a Sword
With many vines wrapped around it,
But no blade inside, alas.
~ The Kojiki, author unknown

name: Sword Of Fire
description: A large flaming sword. Let's burn stuff!

name: Codex Of Nuclear Blast
description: A rare codex bearing the inscrutable mysteries of an epic feat of magic. The scuffed and faded leaves are filled with dire warnings and cautions.

name: Sword Cane
description: This ornate malacca wood cane conceals a slender but deadly sword blade.

name: Quartz Crystal
description: A large chunk of semi-precious quartz.

name: Short Staff
description: A short wooden staff. It's too light to beat anything with, so you'll have to poke enemies with it.

name: Copper Coin
description: Copper coins, small change.

name: Leather Cuirass
description: A hardened leather breastplate. Not very comfortable to wear, but provides protection in combat at a reasonable price.

name: Wand Of Airs
description: A sturdy yew wand, nicely worked and dedicated to the element of air.

name: Medicine Bag
description: A healing medicine bag.

name: Siege Arbalest
description: This is the largest crossbow you've ever seen. It's operated by a giant crank and can punch bolts through an inch of cold steel. You'll be lucky to get off two shots a minute with this, but anything you manage to hit will know all about it.

name: Valentine Necklace
description: A heart shaped locket, lovingly preserved.

name: Greek Fire
description: A pressurised tank of deadly greek fire - a pungent, viscous substance that ignites into searing flame on contact with air or water.

name: Immolator
description: You grasp this flaming sword, and fire engulfs your body...

name: Cask Of Ill Repute
description: This foul smelling liquid disgusts you.

name: Crabshell
description: This steel breastplate is crafted to look like a crab's shell.

name: Conjurers Gloves
description: Enchanted leather gloves, handy in a corner when you need an extra trick up your sleeve.

name: Gatehouse Key
description: A brass key, heavily tarnished and clearly very old.

name: Pickett's Brooch
description: This small golden brooch was given to you by W E Pickett.

name: Succubus Song
description: This appears to be a masterfully wrought and finely tuned violin. You pass the bow over the strings and are amazed by the glowing purple-rich notes that flow from the instrument.

name: Hayai Bo
description: A bamboo staff that has been carefully hand crafted and shod with iron.

name: Silver Sollerets
description: A kingly pair of enchanted silver sollerets.

name: Elven Cape
description: This nondescript looking cape has an uncanny knack of concealing it's wearer.

name: Luther's Fiddle
description: This finely crafted hazelnut fiddle has been varnished to a glowing reddish hue. The severe angles and raking lines set your mind whirling, imagining the complex harmonies it might produce in the right hands. Carved on the neck is a small rose.

name: Script Of Sleep
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Hammer
description: A small iron-headed mallet-style hammer, as useful for pounding in tent pegs as it is for pounding on your enemies.

name: Demonsting
description: A bejewelled compound bow, forged by Ceirdan the smith to protect his monastery from the Demon Queen Al-Sedexus.

name: Chromatic Lyre
description: A handsome twelve-course lyre, tuned to the chromatic scale. The finely crafted wooden body is made of ash, inlaid with sapphire and silver.

name: Silver Bullet
description: Smooth spheres of solid silver. You have heard that they are deadly to undead foes. You have no doubt about their kinetic potential.

name: Ankh Of Poetry
description: A golden ankh, blessed by the gods of rhyme and meter.

name: Time Tobacco
description: A quantity of dried tobacco packaged in brown paper. A black ink stamp on the wrapping says "Time Tobacco (C). For the timeless taste. Warning: excessive comsumption may cause coughing, spluttering and general respiratory malaise."

name: Gem Of Power
description: A necklace bearing a snake carved from a single emerald.

name: Spear Of Death
description: This heavy, iron shod spear radiates menace. A barbaric ostrich feather tassle decorates the haft just below the tip.

name: The Mauler
description: A gigantic mace, just barely usable with one hand. You wonder if it's meant for knocking down small buildings rather than combat.

name: Cuir Guantlets
description: A pair of hard boiled leather guantlets, good protection for your hands.

name: Stave Of Moons
description: A magic staff, embued with spells of slumber.

name: Anointed Cloak
description: A blessed cape for the righteous to wear.

name: Dungore's Malt Ale
description: This pleasantly light trappist-style ale is smooth and clear.

name: Herbal Patty
description: A tasty herbal patty, strictly vegan.

name: Cave Eel
description: Cave Eels are blind white eels that can be found in pools underground. Full of protein and very chewy.

name: Excalibur
description: A famed sword from another world. This is the most finely crafted and balanced great sword you have ever seen, it sings as you draw it shining from it's goodly sheath.

name: Greenwood
description: A unique greenwood bow, meticulously crafted.

name: Book Of Silence
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Silver Cross
description: A cross made from pure silver.

name: Mistletoe Berry
description: Waxy, white berries from the mistletoe plant.

name: Scroll Of Slow
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Slow.

name: Willow Arrow
description: Plain old willow shafted arrows.

name: Jade Figurine
description: A carved jade figurine; a lucky charm of health and healing.

name: Scroll Of Resurrection
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Resurrection.

name: Miners Helmet
description: A tough iron hardhat, with an attached halogen lamp to provide you with illumination down those long dark tunnels.

name: Script Of Sonic Boom
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Mordecai's Cone
description: A nice blue conical wizard's hat. It looks old, but someone has taken very good care of it.

name: Ring Pro Magic
description: A glimmering enchanted ring.

name: Snakeskin Boots
description: A pair of ultra stylish tall snakeskin boots. You've always secretly wanted boots like this.

name: Mageblade
description: This blade has been tuned to to the magical ley lines.

name: Aeromancer's Ring
description: A light silver ring, imprisoning a free spirited air sprite.

name: Jumpstarter
description: Electrodes and a large battery pack allow you to recharge depleted items.

name: Mystic Arrow
description: Enchanted projectiles.

name: Tungsten Filament
description: A long filament of pure tungsten, strong and flexible.

name: Strings Of Seduction
description: This smallish harp is crafted from beechwood and padded with purple velvet cushioning. The strings shimmer softly in the ambient light. You strum them and listen with surprised pleasure to the gentle sounds that pour forth, seemingly unending, only slowly fading into silence.... With a start you realise that you have been standing motionless for nearly a minute, entranced by the unearthly instrument.

name: Hunter's Cape
description: Camouflaged cape of the hunter, deadly and silent.

name: Grimoire Of Acid Cloud
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Blackblade
description: A wicked short sword, blackened for stealthy use.

name: Mahou Wakazashi
description: A masterful short blade, clean and pure, blessed by kami of fire and ice.

name: Knife
description: A large single-edged knife. You've always felt that big knives work better than small knives.

name: Nunchaku
description: Two stout wooden sticks, joined by a short steel chain.

name: Pain
description: The demon Usark traded this potent shortsword to Kane in exchange for the skins of the entire crew of the infamous pirate barque "Blood".

name: Faust
description: This grim halberd is almost as deadly to it's wielder as his foes.

name: Mail Coif
description: A mail coif, covering your head, neck and shoulders.

name: Quilt Leggings
description: Padded quilt leggings, warm and comfy.

name: Fists Of Fury
description: Worn steel gauntlets. Even before slipping them on, you feel bottomless anger and rage radiating from them.

name: C.O.C Bill For Red Ear
description:
WE Pickett gave you this bill to collect from Red Ear. It reads:

Rental (overdue) ..............345.00
Q2 Ichiba Trading License ......17.50
Tax (retail operations) ......2820.00
Interest (unpaid amounts) .......8.50
-------------------------------------
SUBTOTAL .....................3191.00
Administration fee ..............5.00
Late collection levy ............7.00
-------------------------------------
TOTAL DUE ....................3203.00
-------------------------------------

There follows a lot of fine print, including clauses nominating you as the representative of the Ichiba C.O.C. an authorising you to make use of deadly force in the execution of your duties. You don't bother reading it all.

name: Cape Of Stealth
description: A stealthy cape.

name: Script Of Darkness
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Katana
description: A light, single edged sword synonymous with the Samurai.

name: Jesters Cap
description: A colorful, floppy, three pointed hat decorated with jingling bells that just screams "life and soul of the party!"

name: Enchanted Robes (U)
description: The upper portion of a set of nifty enchanted robes.

name: Shadow Cloak
description: A dark, shadowy cape for dark, shadowy folk.

name: Rhinohide Cloak
description: A cloak made from the tough hide of the wild rhino.

name: Razor Stone
description: Small but deadly sling bullets.

name: Large Clockwork Motor
description: A large mechanically powered clockwork motor. Winding the key stores energy in a coiled mainspring, which is then released through various gears, cogs and axels.

name: Devil Dust
description: Unleash the whirlwind...

name: Short Sword Of Swinging
description: Time slows down around you as you grip the hilt of this plain looking short sword. Lazily you execute a few basic cuts, hardly more than half speed; to external observers you are suddenly surrounded by glittering arcs of steel moving at surreal speeds.

name: Granite Shield
description: A round wooden shield, this item smells of earth and moss.

name: Cross Of Protection
description: A cross blessed with spells of warding and resistance.

name: Thunderbolt
description: These small throwing hammers crackle with electricity. On impact they detonate with a fierce bang!

name: Helm Of Insight
description: A mystic leather cap that lets you read the minds of others.

name: Codex Of Dragon
description: A rare codex bearing the inscrutable mysteries of an epic feat of magic. The scuffed and faded leaves are filled with dire warnings and cautions.

name: Bag Of Tricks
description: Who knows what you'll get when you open it?

name: Tabi Boots
description: Split toed soft boots with an always stylish black finish.

name: Claw Of Despair
description: You skin crawls with revulsion at the touch of this heavy black war hammer. The snarling heads of gargoyles or griffons decorate it's surface. It casts no shadow in sunlight, and no reflection in any mirror.

name: Ion Field Generator
description: This bulky field generator can eminate a healing field, bathing the whole party in restorative ions.

name: Falafal
description: A tasty savoury falafal.

name: Nordhammer
description: A brutal black iron morningstar. The entire item, jagged spikes and all, is thickly coated with dried blood and brain matter that you just cannot seem to remove. Someone has crushed a whole lot of heads with this.

name: Wizard's Cone
description: A slightly rumpled but distinguished wizardly hat.

name: Ambercap
description: A large golden-brown mushroom with a subtle honeyed taste. It can be eaten raw or cooked into a restorative stew.

name: Grimoire Of Bolt Of Lightning
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Lion's Claws
description: A bag full of wicked talons.

name: Net Thrower
description: This device uses a spring powered catapult to fling a large net with wicked barbs over your foes.

name: Poignard
description: A long, ornate dagger that would look quite stylish sitting there in a sheath at your hip.

name: Doubleshot
description: An upgraded short stock straight prod crossbow, it shoots two bolts at a time.

name: Silver Kisten
description: A solid silver mace, heavy and deadly. You notice that it glows faintly in low light conditions.

name: Book Of Soul Shield
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Haunting Stick
description: A magic staff, embued with spells of fear and terror.

name: Book Of Rest All
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Throwing Axe
description: A light, short hafted axe, weighted for throwing.

name: Snakeskin Belt
description: A belt made from the hide of a giant snake.

name: Red Mushroom
description: A tasty looking red mushroom.

name: Chain Hosen
description: Mail footware. Rather impractical, but a must for anyone wanting that 'all mail' look.

name: Ebony Plate (L)
description: The lower portion of an enchanted suit of ebony plate armour.

name: Cloth Shirt
description: A nondescript shirt, somewhat travel worn and faded.

name: Daba Brooch
description: A small golden brooch in the shape of a locust.

name: High Pressure Hose
description: Two meters of heat-resistant high pressure hose assembly, including a nozzle and trigger mechanism on one end and a multi-purpose attachment valve at the other.

name: Amulet Of Night
description: A shimmering golden amulet.

name: Mantis Boots
description: Curious green scaled boots, these look like they may have been fashioned from the carapace of a giant mantis.

name: Laser Pointer
description: A small hand held light emitting device.

name: Zizka Star
description: A modified agricultural flail, heavy and brutal.

name: Amulet Of Warning
description: This ornate gold amulet grows warm when danger is near.

name: Crystal Oscillator
description: When activated, this device changes the vibratory frequency of the subject such that he or she may appear to vanish from sight to normal observers.

name: Sorcerer's Ring
description: A bright ruby ring, oozing red magic.

name: Tsubo Suneate
description: Calf hugging light steel plate greaves.

name: Script Of Heal Light Wounds
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Grimoire Of Phantasm
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Ruby Talisman
description: This amulet is clearly very old. Ancient, in fact. It is imbued with spells of truth and clarity.

name: Tricorne Hat
description: A stiff three cornered felt hat. The folded brim directs rainwater away from your face.

name: Pewter Cross
description: A cross, made from humble pewter.

name: Robes (U)
description: The upper portion of a set of robes, shapeless and colourless.  Cowl included.

name: Peacemaker
description: They end fights.

name: Amulet Of Ice
description: A frosty necklace of ice and blizzard.

name: Potion Of Cure Disease
description: A potion to cure disease.

name: Hussar Gauntlets
description: A pair of tough but stylish leather horseman's gloves.

name: Ring Of Stars
description: A heavenly ring of meteoric iron, set with a stone from another planet.

name: Emerald Talisman
description: A necklace bearing a lizard carved from a single emerald.

name: Omnigun Prototype
description: This prototype projectile weapon has been built up from a decomissioned flintlock musket. After retrofitting a wider barrel, the black powder firing system has been replaced with a conical compression spring integrated with the existing trigger mechanism. A manual-reset bolt and a hinged loading panel complete the device. It's already quieter and more reliable than the flintlock and can be loaded with a wider range of ammunition, but you believe it could be so much more...

name: Lazurite Crystal
description: A hard, deep blue lazurite crystal the size of your fist. You have to concentrate for a moment to remember that the chemical formula for lazurite is (Na,Ca)8[(S,Cl,SO4,OH)2|(Al6Si6O24)].

name: Master Scalemail
description: A perfectly crafted suit of scale mail.

name: Yamabushi Headband
description: A mystic headband for the leader of the party.

name: Chain Of Ice
description: An icy blue chain hauberk, cold to the touch.

name: Bastard Sword
description: An oversized hand-and-a-half sword, too big to use one handed and too small to afford a proper gip with both hands. Still, it's heavy enough to put a proper dent in the helmet of anything that you come up against.

name: RPG Launcher
description: This weapon is a meter long metal tube with an attached trigger mechanism, used for launching rocket propelled grenades. In the hands of a skilled user it is capable of delivering an armour piercing shaped charge at high velocity and accurate at up to a hundred meters. On the grip of this one strange block-like runes spell the words "Ruchnoy Protivotankovyy Granatomyot".

name: Dragon Plate (L)
description: The lower portion of an enchanted suit of red steel plate armour. Fearsome etchings of dragons coil around the piece.

name: Black Powder
description: This potent chemical explosive needs no more than a touch of fire to spark a destructive explosion.

name: Maiden Head
description: A finely crafted flanged mace.

name: Holy Water
description: Holy water, to dispel undead creatures.

name: Crystal Monocle
description: Just the thing for polishing on your private yacht.

name: Hand Cannon Mk4
description: You have once again managed to increase the efficiency of the ammo supply system in the device. You now feel that your rate of fire is on par with that of a skilled archer. Once again an improvement to the powder formula has resulted in an increased muzzle velocity, enough to lay some foes flat on their backs with a single shot.

name: Hand Cannon Mk5
description: You have added rifling to the barrel, and increased the size of the firing chamber to accomodate more black powder. The steadily increasing kick of the gun has necessitated adding a recoil dampener.

name: Scroll Of Rest All
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Rest All.

name: Flamethrower
description: This weapon system projects a stream of deadly Greek Fire over your foes. The viscous fluid ignites on contact with air or water, and can be spurted over thirty meters in a blazing column of sticky death. It adheres walls, floors and your unlucky foes and continues to burn for a period of time.

name: Hand Cannon Mk6
description: You have finally perfected your secret black powder formula. The slugs from this hand cannon are travelling at sufficient velocity to pierce the thickest armour you can find to test with.

name: Demon Harp
description: A fearsome looking bone longbow, adorned with a tanned leather grip and strung with something that looks like hair. It reeks sorcery and black magic. You try to avoid thinking where the materials it is contructed with came from.

name: Logic Field Generator
description: The predictable, irresistable ticking of a small mechanical metronome is amplified through a chunk of crystal. This device brings terror and confusion to magic using foes as it forces them to confront the essential logic and order that underlies the physical universe.

name: Boomerang Shuriken
description: A shuriken that returns to the thrower, who had better be ready to catch it.

name: Stave Of Missiles
description: A magic staff, embued with spells of damage and pain.

name: Hand Cannon Mk1
description: Your first modification to the weapon is to do away with the pesky need for ammunition. An integrated magazine and a large hopper for shot relieves the tedious need for reloading. You have taken to calling your new toy a 'hand cannon'.

name: Scroll Of Mesmerism
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Mesmerism.

name: Hand Cannon Mk2
description: You have upgraded your hand cannon, increasing the bore of the barrel and the black powder load used with each charge. The new device bellows smoke, flame and noise in a manner that terrifies your foes, in addition to increasingly deadly projectiles. You have also reworked the ammo hopper to decrease reload times and improved the overall balance of the piece.

name: Hand Cannon Mk3
description: An improved sighting mechanism and another tweak to the balance have made this the most accurate fire arm that you have ever used. You have started using a personal black powder recipe that combines faster combustion with greater explosive potential.

name: Cap Of Wiles
description: A tight fitting cloth skullcap.

name: Plate Mail (U)
description: The upper portion of a suite of fine steel plate armour.

name: Codex Of Vampirism
description: A rare codex bearing the inscrutable mysteries of an epic feat of magic. The scuffed and faded leaves are filled with dire warnings and cautions.

name: Hurlblat
description: Metal throwing axes sharpened on every auxiliary end to a point or blade, greatly increasing the chance of some form of damage against the target.

name: Disruptor Shield
description: This shield provides full spectrum protection.

name: Glass Slippers
description: Dainty slippers made of pure glass. You'll be the prettiest girl at the ball.

name: Soulstealer
description: A jet black longsword. The hilt feels warm and alive in your hand, and you have an uneasy feeling that some evil presence within the blade has suddenly awoken from it's slumber and taken notice of you...

name: Wytch Stix
description: Discharging one of these unleashes a bolt of darkness at your enemies.

name: Amulet Of Illusions
description: An amulet to summon illusionary allies for your defence.

name: The Avenger
description: A lightning hilted, flaming bastard sword, once wielded by the fabled Black Paladin. Your foes will feel your wrath.

name: Ninja Cowl
description: A flexible hood, made from wrapping two meter long black cloths around the head.

name: Impaling Stone
description: Deadly, enchanted sling stones.

name: Shiken Shuri
description: Needle sharp steel throwing stars.

name: Ebony Amulet
description: This large, heavy amulet is solid ebony. The face is intricately carved into a representation of some kind of foliage twined around what might be an eyeless skull, or a flower. The reverse is smooth save for some lettering that might be a name: I M O G E N.

name: Stonewall Helm
description: A cold iron helm ornamented with a basalt rock.

name: Grimoire Of Remedy
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Book Of Cure Disease
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Ankh Of Death
description: A cold ankh of death.

name: Zweihander
description: A finely crafted two handed sword, nearly two meters long and sporting an ornate hilt.

name: Robes Of Rejuvenation
description: Great, flowing robes, pulsing with magical energy.

name: Butterfly Knife
description: This ancient dagger pulses with dark and deadly power. You fear to invoke it's secret powers.

name: Potion Of Superman
description: A potion to boost your peformance.

name: Jo Stick
description: A short, slender wooden staff, smoothed and intended for use as a weapon.

name: Rutabaga
description: A nice big juicy rutabaga.

name: Gown (U) Of Divine Mail
description: Blessed chainmail, to protect and heal.

name: Antenor's Ring
description: This plain red-gold band seems faintly warm to the touch. Etched in angular runes on the inside surface you read the letters A N T E N O R.

name: Amulet Of Health
description: A golden amulet, enchanted with spells that are always hard at work healing you.

name: Lynx Ring
description: A slim golden ring, with a snarling lynx head signet.

name: Deadeye Talisman
description: A talisman enchanted with spells of accuracy and foresight.

name: Scroll Of Remove Curse
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Remove Curse.

name: Faerie Dust
description: A sprinkling of faerie dust, likely to send your enemies into a dazed stupor.

name: Amulet Of Static
description: Imbued with spells of lightning.

name: Lance
description: A heavy cavalry lance, complete with a circular vamplate. It's not really intended for infantry use, but that isn't going to stop a hero like you.

name: Rainbow Shield
description: A shimmering metal shield, radiating power and protection.

name: Grimoire Of Starlight
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Automated Lockpick
description: Once attached to a mechanical lock, this clever device can automatically sort through the combinations to unlock it. It can disarm traps in a similar way.

name: Shaolin Sash
description: A sash from a famous monastery.

name: Potion Of Bless
description: Blesses the imbiber.

name: Thieves Bow
description: A light shortbow, blackened and quickly strung. Just the tool you need for sniping from the shadows.

name: Crusader Axe
description: A heavy, well made bipennis. You can tell that this has seen some heavy action.

name: Scroll Of Magic Screen
description: A magical scroll inscribed with the spell Magic Screen.

name: Diamond Eyes
description: An ornate diamond studded mace. Grasping it, your eyes flash with majestic authority and you seem an inch taller than anyone else in the room.

name: Skeleton Powder
description: Horrifying dust ground from a hundred skulls. A pinch can bring down the mightiest warrior.

name: Coif Of Divine Mail
description: A coif of blessed chainmail.

name: Ankh Of Life
description: A precious ankh of life.

name: Taflen Seeds
description: A handful of mysterious seeds, each no bigger than a pea but oddly heavy. Their dark green skins are covered with fine hairy bristles.

name: Bread Roll
description: Some bread rolls, still just about fresh enough to eat.

name: Silver Circlet
description: A nice silver circlet for your head.

name: Sword Of Damla
description: This slender silver longsword is finely balanced. The blade glows faintly blue in the low light. The pommel bears a raised teardrop emblem.

name: Heaume
description: A sturdy steel great helm. Nothing protects your head quite like a large amount of cold metal.

name: Script Of Disease
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Copper Mesh
description: A flat mesh of beaten copper.

name: Grimoire Of Diplomacy
description: An ancient grimoire in which are inscribed the secrets of a potent spell. The fragile pages are crammed with arcane formulae, and the cryptic scribblings of sages long dead fill the margins.

name: Book Of Pain
description: A complicated spellbook, to teach you a mid level spell. Includes detailed diagrams and a foreword by a famous researcher.

name: Leather Gloves
description: A pair of large, tough leather gloves, perfect for the intrepid  adventurer who never knows when he or she is going to be elbow deep in something filthy.

name: Script Of Flame Blade
description: Notes that will teach you a beginner spell. Includes illustrations.

name: Bracers Of Defense
description: Leather fore-arm bracers, enchanted with runes of protection and interception.

name: Hades Harp
description: You feel uneasy handling this large, beautiful harp. The dark redwood frame is smooth and silky to the touch, and the gossamer strings quiver at your caress. Your questing fingers feel strange runes carved beneath the sound board. Turning the instrument to read them, a chill runs down your spine. "Hark ye mortal harpist. Hades listens for thy notes."
